org.tc: 采風智匯股份有限公司

info.tc:
•    DeepXray™：利用⼀般X光進⾏慢性骨骼疾病（骨質疏鬆症、退化性關節炎）精準診斷與病情進展自動分析的醫療AI輔助診斷系統(已獲FDA及T-FDA許可)。
•    DeepSono™：利用⼼臟超音波進⾏慢性⼼臟疾病（⼼臟衰竭、心臟疾病）精準自動量測的醫療AI輔助診斷系統（2024年提供服務）。
•    DeepPACS：實現「零點擊」無縫臨床流程整合、內建企業級資料庫伺服器並支援標準DICOM服務的醫療影像AI服務平台，搭配DeepXrayTM 與 DeepSonoTM AI輔助診斷系統，可實現醫療AI流程自動化與 AI報告即時輸出 (已獲T-FDA許可，此項服務免除FDA許可)。
info.en:
•  DeepXray™: AI-assisted diagnosis system utilizing plain X-rays for precision diagnosis and automated monitoring of osteoporosis and osteoarthritis, the most prevalent chronic bone diseases (FDA and T-FDA approved).
•  DeepSono™: AI-assisted diagnosis system utilizing cardiac ultrasound for automated image quality assessment and precision measurement of cardiac functions, including ejection fraction and myocardial strains (to be released in 2024).
•  DeepPACS: Medical image AI-service platform with standard DICOM service and built-in enterprise-grade database server, enabling streamlined workflow via AIM’s “Zero-Click” pipeline design for instant, fully automated AI report generation (T-FDA approved).

org.tc: 佛教慈濟醫療財團法人大林慈濟醫院
org.en: Dalin Tzu Chi Hospital, Buddhist Tzu Chi Medical Foundation

info.tc:
嘉義大林慈濟醫院將在醫療科技盛會上展現令人驚豔的創新八大主題：
1.	行動醫療系統App：自行開發，次世化醫療可連結，且跨平台應用，APP含查房、急診、護理、拍照等功能
2.	LINE及LINE Notify：全台首家活用API整合醫療諮詢，打造個人化「AI健康秘書」，並首創應用於ADC藥櫃安全庫存提醒
3.	Power BI給合APP及自動化的應用：推動超過400項目，並建立平台，使數據分析更加精準
4.	五項專利產品亮相：展示多項創新技術，如伸縮式醫療用管路套組、呼吸器面罩多功能結構等，為醫療領域帶來新的應用價值
5.	智能實驗室：串聯智能自動設備，建置單件檢驗流程，有效消除八大浪費，提升效率減少錯誤，讓檢驗更具醫療價值

7.	卓越新創專利智慧放射治療平台：全台市佔率最高的新創專利智慧放射治療平台，擁有多項全國首創功能介面，並通過多項發明專利認證，功能性最齊全之商運系統
8.	定位系統：提供便捷的導航和服務，提升醫療照護品質及效率

org.tc: 國立臺灣⼤學醫學院附設醫院

info.tc:
臺大醫院創建於西元1895年，院址初設於臺北市大稻埕，1898年遷至現址（現稱為西址）；當時為木造建築，1912年開始進行整建為文藝復興風格之熱帶式建築，於1921年完工，是當時東南亞最大型、最現代化之醫院。
1991年新大樓（現稱東址）整建完成，兩院區間由景福地下通道貫連。目前有員工6,700餘人，病床2,600餘張，每日門診服務量逾8,000人次。2000年奉行政院核定，接收國軍817醫院為臺大醫院公館院區；2004年4月衛生署雲林醫院改制為臺大醫院雲林分院，同年8月國立臺北護理學院附設醫院改制為臺大醫院北護分院；2008年啟用兒童醫療大樓；2009年公館院區因籌建臺大癌醫中心醫院而停止營運；2010年10月承接北海岸金山醫院，改制為臺大醫院金山分院；2011年7月承接行政院衛生署新竹醫院及行政院衛生署竹東醫院，分別改制為臺大醫院新竹分院及竹東分院；2019年底自行籌建之新竹生醫園區分院加入營運；2021年1月將新竹地區三家分院(原新竹分院、竹東分院及新竹生醫園區分院)整併為新竹臺大分院；2021年6月臺大癌醫中心醫院改制為臺大醫院癌醫中心分院，不僅臺大醫院之醫療體系日益茁壯，亦將為民眾提供全方面之醫療服務。
創建迄今百餘年來，臺大醫院培育醫界人才無數，包括醫學生、專科醫師、藥師、護理師等醫事人員等，學員分佈全球各地，頭角崢嶸，表現優異。在醫療服務上，臺大醫院的臨床醫療品質更是名聞遐邇，備受國人信賴。而臺大醫院在肝炎、器官移植、癌症診斷治療及生醫光電和臨床試驗藥物研發上的尖端研究成就，亦獲得國際的肯定而享負盛名。
身為國家級教學醫院，臺大醫院肩負著教學、研究、服務三大任務。教學方面配合延續醫學院的課程設計，培育醫學及各類專科醫學人才；研究方面整合研究資源，成立核心研究室，提供同仁最好的研究設備與研究環境；服務方面以病人安全為中心的服務導向，強調人性化的照護，著重醫療品質及病人安全管理，以提供高品質的精緻醫療服務。臺大醫院亦致力於推動國際合作，以擷取各先進國家醫療發展的經驗與知識，促進我國醫療的蓬勃發展。今後仍將秉承優良的傳統繼續努力奮進。

org.tc: 亞洲準譯股份有限公司

info.tc:
亞洲準譯(APG)百微解APGseq，提供「全面」、「精準」、「快速」的感染病原基因定序檢測服務，以提升人類健康和醫療品質。該公司在台灣專注於病原基因定序，其產品為第一個獲得政府機關認可的病原定序檢測。擁有專利級基因定序技術和生物資訊分析系統，並持續與醫療機構和臨床醫生密切合作，建置更新本土病原基因體資料庫，確保檢測服務的高品質。
APGseq 檢測服務可對血液、肺泡灌洗液、組織等樣品進行定序。一次比對超過萬種病原體，於24~48小時內提供檢測報告。及時輔助醫師精準診斷並制定對應臨床決策，特別對於急、重、難病患提供更迅速及高效的診斷支持。
info.en:
Asia Pathogenomics (APG) is a Taiwanese company specializing in pathogen detection using advanced metagenomic sequencing technology and bioinformatics analysis. APG offers APGseq, a certified clinical metagenomic sequencing service to deliver comprehensive, precise, and express diagnostics to improve health and medical quality. The company collaborates with medical institutions and clinicians to develop and update the Taiwanese pathogen database, ensuring high-quality testing. 
APGseq offers sequencing of blood, bronchoalveolar lavage fluid, tissue, and more samples. Capable of detecting 27,000 pathogens with high accuracy. Results are provided within 24-48 hours, empowering physicians to make vital decisions early and with precision, especially for urgent, severe, and challenging infection cases, enhancing medical care in Asia.

org.tc: 行動基因生技股份有限公司

info.tc:
行動基因是一家屢獲殊榮的癌症解決方案提供商，由來自學術界的小組科學家於 2014 年創立。我們以行動基因 (ACT Genomics) 的名字反映了我們對「將基因資訊變成行動」的熱情，我們致力於將學術理論應用於臨床實踐中，真正讓所有人都可以使個人化癌症護理。

多年來，我們的實際經驗幫助學術研究取得了顯著的進展，從而改善了我們的癌症解決方案以高效率和準確性。作為台灣和更廣泛的亞洲地區的先驅，我們致力於為癌症患者提供先進的基因體檢測，並繼續在精密醫學方面精進。
info.en:
ACT Genomics is an award-winning cancer solution provider founded in 2014 by a small group of scientists from academia. With our name, ACT Genomics, reflecting our passion to “turn genomics into action”, we set out to apply academic theories in clinical practice and truly make personalized cancer care accessible to all.

Over the years, our practical experience has helped academic research make remarkable progress, which has in turn enhanced our cancer solutions with high efficiency and accuracy. As a pioneer in Taiwan and the wider Asian region, we are committed to empowering cancer patients with advanced genomic treatments and continuing to make strides forward in precision medicine.

info.tc: 騰達行企業股份有限公司成立於1986年，專注於代理及經銷生命科學相關試劑與儀器。我們深耕精準醫學、藥物開發、細胞與基因治療等領域，以「Accelerating Your Research」為核心價值，致力於為客戶提供最優質的產品及服務。本次，我們將展示包括外泌體（Exosome）及第三代定序（Oxford Nanopore Technologies）等各種應用方案，誠摯邀請各界蒞臨指導。

org.tc: 國際精準檢測產業聯盟
org.en: International Laboratory Developed Tests and Services Industry Alliance

info.tc:
國際精準檢測產業聯盟的成立源於對於精準醫療分子檢測實驗室日益增長的需求以及新興生物技術的快速發展。分子檢測在現代醫療體系與生命科學領域中扮演著至關重要的角色，它可以用來作為伴隨式診斷、個性化治療的依據甚至於監控病情的發展，來為患者提供更好的醫療護理。

衛生福利部食品藥物管理署也特別重視此一領域，並於110年2月9日將實驗室開發檢測(Laboratory Developed Tests, LDTs)納入特管辦法，為確保檢測實驗室和機構遵從高標準的質量控制和技術規範提供了關鍵支持。

為了提升與推動台灣在全球精準檢測領域的競爭力，精準檢測領域的公司與專業人士決定聯合成立國際精準檢測產業聯盟，聯盟的目標是促進精準醫療分子檢測的發展，將精準檢測的技術更好的落實在臨床醫療，並提升台灣在全球精準檢測領域的競爭力。
info.en:
The establishment of the   International Laboratory Developed Tests and Services Industry Alliance from the growing demand for precision medical molecular testing laboratories and the rapid development of emerging biotechnologies. 

Molecular testing plays a crucial role in modern healthcare systems and the life sciences field. It can be used as the basis for companion diagnostics, personalized therapies, and even monitoring the progression of diseases, thus providing better medical care for patients.

org.tc: 中國醫藥大學附設醫院

info.tc:
中國醫藥大學，為教學與研究並重之頂尖大學，並積極與世界一流大學、醫學中心及研究機構合作與交流，更榮獲英國泰晤士「2019亞洲大學排名」臺灣第3名、私校第1。
中國醫藥大學暨醫療體系，目前有中國醫藥大學附設醫院、兒童醫院、北港附設醫院、台南市市立安南醫院、新竹附設醫院等，從醫學中心到診所共16家體系院所。
為提供更高品質的醫療服務，我們積極發展尖端醫學如幹細胞療法、免疫細胞療法、基因療法，並且積極建構人工智慧醫院，發展人工智慧、精準醫學、3D列印醫療、醫材輔具等，並設立「新竹健康產學園區」及「中國醫藥大學水湳校區」。
我們以「急、重、難症為基礎」、「以企業社會責任為使命」，將以此精神服務全體國民，提供最好的「教學、研究、服務」品質，並且發展卓越的生醫產業，以實現成為「卓越優秀的世界一流的中、西醫學中心」及「全球聞名的高科技生醫園區」之願景。

org.tc: 聖安生醫股份有限公司

info.tc:
1.	SOA101奈米三特異性雙免疫檢查點抗體
•	亞洲領先，唯一靶向癌症細胞上雙免疫檢查點之三特異性抗體。
•	具專一度高之癌症靶點HLA-G及PD-L1/HLA-G雙免疫檢查點抗體，克服癌細胞免疫逃脫，減少抗藥性及提升治療有效性。
•	為治療多種實體癌之廣效性新藥。

2.	SOA201 EphA10三特異性T細胞銜接抗體 
•	三特異性抗體靶向雙免疫細胞。
•	EphA10腫瘤抗原在三陰性乳癌高度表現(正常細胞幾乎不表現)，安全性高，解決三陰性乳癌無標靶藥物治療之困境。
•	可活化且增生T cells and NK cells，增加抗癌療效。
•	為治療多種實體癌之廣效性新藥。

3.	SOB101工程化外泌體搭載藥物 
•	亞洲領先，唯一具有HLA-G靶點之外泌體抗癌藥。
•	基因工程改質其具備anti-HLAG功能之外泌體，專一結合於腫瘤細胞，有效降低化療藥物用量。
•	可搭載多種藥物。
•	為治療多種實體癌之廣效性新藥。

4.	SOB102新穎抗癌外泌體核酸藥物
•	具備HLA-G靶點，有效及安全的將搭載的核酸藥物及化療藥物送到腫瘤處。
•	可穿過腦血屏障，解決多形性膠質母細胞瘤(GBM)具抗藥性之臨床治療困境。
info.en:
1.	SOA101: Nano Triple-Specific Dual Immune Checkpoint Antibody
•	Leading in Asia, the only triple-specific antibody targeting dual immune checkpoints on cancer cells.
•	Highly specific cancer-targeting HLA-G and PD-L1/HLA-G dual immune checkpoint antibodies can overcome immune escape of cancer cells, reduce drug resistance, and improve therapeutic effectiveness.
•	A broad-spectrum novel drug for the treatment of various solid tumors.

2.	SOA201:EphA10 Triple-Specific T cell Engaging Antibody
•	Tri-specific antibody targets dual immune cells.
•	The EphA10 tumor antigen is highly expressed in triple-negative breast cancer (almost negligible expression in normal cells), providing high safety and addressing the therapeutic challenges of lacking targeted drug treatments for triple-negative breast cancer.
•	Activates and proliferates T cells and NK cells, enhancing anti-cancer efficacy.
•	A broad-spectrum novel drug for the treatment of various solid tumors.

3.	SOB101:Engineered Exosomes with Drug Payloads
•	Leading in Asia, the only exosome-based anti-cancer drug targeting HLA-G.
•	Genetically engineered exosomes with anti-HLA-G functionality specifically bind to tumor cells, effectively reducing the dosage of chemotherapy drugs. 
•	Capable of carrying multiple drugs.
•	A broad-spectrum novel drug for the treatment of various solid tumors.

4.	SOB102: Novel Anti-Cancer Exosomal Nucleic Acid Drug
•	Targeting HLA-G, it effectively and safely deliver the carried nucleic acid drugs and chemotherapy drugs to the tumor.
•	It can cross the blood-brain barrier and solve the clinical treatment dilemma of drug-resistant glioblastoma multiforme (GBM).

info.tc: 瓦里安醫療系統創立於1948年，是首家誕生於矽谷的高科技醫療公司。以創造一個無懼癌症的世界為願景，瓦里安醫療已成為研發和提供癌症治療解決方案的全球領導者。我們前瞻地應用人工智慧、機器學習和資料分析等先進技術打造智慧癌症治療方式，致力於提供領先的放射治療、放射外科、質子治療、近距離放射治療和介入治療解決方案，支援全球臨床合作夥伴每年為超過四百萬患者提供治療。2021年，瓦里安醫療成為西門子醫療的一員。
info.en: At Varian, a Siemens Healthineers company, we envision a world without fear of cancer. For more than 70 years, we have developed, built and delivered innovative cancer care technologies and solutions for our clinical partners around the globe to help them treat millions of patients each year. With an Intelligent Cancer Care approach, we are harnessing advanced technologies like artificial intelligence, machine learning and data analytics to enhance cancer treatment and expand access to care. Our 11,000 employees across 70 locations keep the patient and our clinical partners at the center of our thinking as we power new victories in cancer care. Because, for cancer patients everywhere, their fight is our fight. For more information, visit http://www.varian.com and follow @VarianMedSys on Twitter.

info.tc:
1.「雷帝納RETINA手術導航系統」為協助外科醫師在手術中使用的導航系統，主要適應症範圍涵蓋神經外科、顱顏外科、耳鼻喉科、整形外科與口腔顎面外科等手術。RETINA輔助外科醫師於手術時即時導航器械至病灶並提供同步的醫療影像。利用RETINA進行手術的優點為傷口比傳統手術小，完成更安全、精準的微創手術，從而為患者提供更好的醫療服務。
2.「醫擘EPROB機械手臂立體定位輔助手術系統」是用於神經外科的立體定位輔助機械手臂系統，透過智慧醫學影像軟體結合精密機械手臂輔助手術定位，術後傷口比傳統小、復原快，提高了手術準確度、安全性與成功率，並達到微創手術的成效。
3.nTMS是種結合重覆經顱磁刺激(rTMS) 與精準定位系統的最新治療方式，國外論文證實nTMS治療方式對於憂鬱症的緩解率(90.48%)遠高於單純使用rTMS治療的緩解率(37%)。利用「RETINA Elite雷帝納精準定位系統」結合重覆經顱磁刺激(rTMS)將可科技化既有治療，精準定位治療在正確位置，達到協助醫師即時檢視治療位置，保持最佳治療成效。
info.en:
1.	The “RETINA stereotactic surgery navigation system” gathers the state of the art of navigation combining it with perfect accuracy during diverse surgical procedures including Neurosurgery, E.N.T., Craniofacial, Plastic Surgery, Oral and Maxillofacial Surgery. It reduces unnecessary tissue injuries, to aid in minimally invasive surgeries, which provide overall better medical service for patients.

org.tc: 偉喬生醫股份有限公司

info.tc:
慢性腎臟病在台灣盛行率極高。腎功能下降造成腎毒素無法排除體外，其中親蛋白質腎毒素(如硫酸吲哚酚)容易與血液中蛋白質結合，累積而造成內臟損傷。
硫酸吲哚酚檢測試劑組為偉喬生醫開發全球首創、高效率檢測慢性腎臟病關鍵指標之試劑。我們突破小分子抗體研發瓶頸，首創親蛋白小分子腎毒素硫酸吲哚酚之抗體，獲得多國專利，亦獲得CE歐洲認證。可取代傳統LC-MS/MS昂貴、費時及不便性，以快速方便高通量的方式，檢測病患體內硫酸吲哚酚濃度，提供臨床醫師及病患更多腎功能不良之指標資訊，針對病情及早治療，可廣泛應用於臨床研究、腎臟疾病篩檢、病程及用藥治療評估等領域。
info.en: The LEADGENE® Indoxyl Sulfate (IS) ELISA Kit is the first CE-registered IVD for detecting protein-bound uremic toxins (PBUTs), which is critical for managing chronic kidney disease (CKD). CKD results from reduced kidney function and a waste buildup, including harmful PBUTs like IS. Accurately and timely detection of PBUTs is essential for monitoring the kidneys' filtration rate. Traditional detection methods like HPLC-MS/MS are costly, time-consuming, and limited to specialized facilities. Leveraging our expertise in antibody discovery, Leadgene developed patented monoclonal antibodies that power our IS ELISA Kit. Using a competitive ELISA method, the kit offers a quick, sensitive, and cost-effective solution for quantifying IS levels in human serum, making it accessible to a broader range of medical facilities.

org.tc: 國立成功大學基因體醫學中心
org.en: Center for Genomic Medicine, National Cheng Kung University

info.tc:
【衛福部LDTS認證之母胎精準醫學分子檢測實驗室】

國立成功大學基因體醫學中心成立至今已超過20年，是台灣最早的基因體中心之一。團隊以「專業、卓越、精確、創新」為品質目標，致力於開發母胎精準醫學分子檢測項目。目前已開發完成14項相關檢測，不但在2021年全部通過TAF (ISO 17025)認證，更在5月時通過衛生福利部「精準醫療分子檢測實驗室檢測與服務（Laboratory Developed Tests and Services，LDTS）」認證，為台灣第一家列冊登錄的母胎基因檢測的機構，也是國內學研單位第一個通過LDTS認證的實驗室。

成大基因體醫學中心的所有檢測服務均為自行開發，從收檢、數據分析到出報告均不假他人之手、在地台灣完成。檢體不會因為跨國運送而影響品質，一站式的檢測亦可以確保檢驗精確性及檢測資訊不外流，保障受試者的個人資訊。我們期許藉著衛福部LDTS列冊的肯定，可以將成大基因體醫學中心開發的優質檢測服務提供給更廣大的民眾。

此外中心積極創新，開發新穎的AI智能輔助判別系統，以應用在大數據基因檢測項目，大幅度提升準確度並加速turn-around 時程。其中「智慧優質胚胎預測系統」(intelligent cOmputing Noble Embryo, icONE)展現了絕佳的預測精準度，已榮獲2021年第18屆「國家新創獎」的智慧醫療與健康科技類新創殊榮。未來將投入臨床人工生殖/試管嬰兒服務，藉著「智慧挑選」、「精準植入」，幫助不孕及嘗試懷孕的夫妻達到一次療程就成功的目的，體現精準醫療以人為本的核心價值。

我們秉持著「您的心肝、我們的寶貝」的信念，每個檢測都以最高標準檢視，並提供完整的遺傳諮詢服務，讓委託檢測的民眾能夠真正信任與安心！成大基因體醫學中心將持續努力，源源不竭的將研發成果轉譯應用於臨床檢測，為國內婦幼精準醫療盡一份心力！
info.en:
TFDA-certified laboratory for maternal-fetal precision medicine

Center for Genomic Medicine (CGM) is a Taiwan-based modern core laboratory for genomic research and translates results from scientific studies into clinical practices. 
CGM has been established for over 20 years and is one of the first genomic centers in Taiwan. We provide a total solution for Maternal-fetal precision medicine through high-quality NGS technology, bioinformatics, and AI predictive algorithm. Our goal is to turn the prenatal genetic testing into a new era of faster, more accurate and comprehensive next-generation healthcare system.


Accreditations

All of our genetic services have been certified as “Laboratory Developed Tests and Services (LDTS)” by Taiwan Food and Drug Administration (TFDA; LDT0007), and obtained ISO/IEC 17025 certificate from Taiwan Accreditation Foundation (TAF). We are the first registered LDTS laboratory for genetic testing of maternal-fetal precision medicine in Taiwan.

info.tc: 智捷生醫提供最先進的醫療用Anatomy Cloud服務。Anatomy Cloud由Anatomy AI和Anatomy XR組成。傳統的黑白2D CT/MRI醫療影像可以通過我們的Anatomy AI全自動識別各內臟和組織，並即時轉換成彩色3D影像模型。轉換後的模型可以利用Anatomy XR功能在PC、手機和VR/MR設備上查看，並可用於醫療現場的臨床（診斷、分析、MR手術）、教育和數據儲存。此外，Anatomy XR還可以通過通訊軟體實現遠程醫療和教育。我們在醫療領域實現一個集合人工智慧、雲端服務和虛擬實境技術的創新生態系統。
info.en: Intelligent Technology provides cutting-edge medical anatomy cloud services. The Anatomy Cloud consists of Anatomy AI and Anatomy XR. The organs and body tissues in traditional black-and-white, 2D CT/MRI medical images can be automatically identified by our Anatomy AI, which can instantly convert them into colored 3D models. The converted models are compatible with PCs, mobile phones, and VR/MR devices using the Anatomy XR feature and can be utilized in clinical usages(diagnosis, analysis, MR surgery), education, and data storage. Additionally, Anatomy XR enables telemedicine and education through communication softwares. This innovative ecosystem integrates artificial intelligence, cloud services, and virtual reality technology in the medical field.

info.tc:
臺北醫學大學創立於1960年，歷經60餘年努力耕耘，在不斷的擴展、蛻變創新下，發展至今共有11學院、1通識教育中心，在校學生人數逾6,000名，已培育超過47,000名畢業校友，分佈海內外各醫療機構、學術單位及產業界。本校擁有臺北醫學大學附設醫院、市立萬芳醫院、部立雙和醫院及新國民醫院，2013年整合三院癌症醫療系統成立「臺北癌症中心」；2017年成立「臺北神經醫學中心」以臨床為主軸，發展整合性神經醫學，共有六所優質附屬醫院。
本校秉持「人文關懷、誠信正直、創新卓越、團隊合作、社會服務」之核心價值，近年來致力於教學卓越、研究拔尖、產學績優、接軌國際與服務社會等發展面向，奠定本校以「醫學教育為本，生醫臨床為用，具社會影響力之創新型大學」為定位，以創新轉譯醫學為主軸，致力於厚實基礎研究、整合六附屬醫院臨床資源及推動生技醫療產業為目標。
info.en:
Established in 1960, over the past century, Taipei Medical University underwent the process of continuous expansion, transformation and innovation. Today, TMU has expanded into a world-class university with 11 Colleges and 1 General Education Center, 6000 students per year, 47,000 alumni around Medical Academic Institute, Medical Industry and six affiliated hospitals which are TMU hospital, Wan Fang Hospital, Shuang Ho Hospital, Hsin Kuo Min Hospital, Tapei Cancer Center and Taipei Neuroscience Institute.
Based on the core value of humanistic empathy, honesty and integrity, innovation, teamwork and social service, TMU is dedicated to excellent teaching, outstanding research, industry-academia collaboration, international participation and social service, in order to integrate clinical resource of affiliated hospitals and meet the visions of translation medicine innovation, biomedical industry development, research advancement and positive social influence. 3 main strategies of future development are below.

info.en: Tzu Chi Charity Foundation had set foot around the world in over 122 countries. Therefore, Hualien Tzu Chi Hospital already became an internationalized medical center, which has accumulated many fruitful accomplishments over 38 years in medical aspects. For many years, it collaborated with charity, education, culture main missions and continued to provide innovation and hope within the Taiwan medical systems. Hence, our hospital participates in this exhibition with co-development firms. Our central theme this year is ”Stem cell innovative therapy” followed with other hot issues, including cell therapy, cancer immune treatment, development of new drugs and innovative medical appliances, smart healthcare, preventive medicine, international healthcare, and New Southbound Projects. We hope to share our accomplishments with society. Through this exhibition, our hospital wishes to enhance international links and achieve the initial intention of innovative development with people-oriented thoughts in the end.

info.tc: 醫療環境需要滿足最高衛生標準的零組件。免上油、耐腐蝕的滑動軸承和特殊的工程塑膠製成的供能係統是合適的選擇方案。工程塑膠軸承可用於X-ray機器手、實驗室設備、病患和治療椅、醫院的床位和義肢。免保養的拖鏈可用於保護和引導電纜，電纜則在手術室設備、康復系統和診斷設備中被廣泛使用。易格斯的零組件適用於無塵室、耐介質、安靜，符合最高的醫療要求。
info.en: Medical surroundings require components that fulfil the highest hygiene standards. Our plain bearings and energy supplies made of a high-performance plastic are the right choice. With their solid lubricants incorporated in the plastic material, our bearings are clean and quiet, corrosion-resistant and completely maintenance-free. They are successfully used in X-ray robots, laboratory equipment, treatment chairs, hospital beds and prostheses. Our quiet and low-vibration energy chains ensure safe energy supply even in confined spaces, for example in operating theatres, rehabilitation systems and diagnostic imaging. We also have cleanroom-compatible models up to ISO Class 1 in our product range.

info.tc:
”宇心” 12導心電圖系統為醫療級，用於心臟疾病的篩檢儀器。獨特的產品設計可彈性應用在不同醫療場域，延伸至遠距會診、急診、緊急救護、偏鄉醫療，CRO、長照中心與居家照護等。
不同於傳統機型，僅67g的重量輕巧可攜，搭配的專利電極貼片省去複雜導線，讓檢查可在1分鐘完成操作，更簡單、更衛生。透過臨床試驗證明與醫院用高階機種達相同水準，並取得FDA,TFDA與CE。搭配APP與符合HIPAA雲端管理系統，克服過去院內心電圖無法普及的困難，為心臟照護帶來新的可能。
info.en:
The world’s most user-friendly 12-lead ECG system !

The PCA 500 is an entire ECG solution that simplifies and streamlines the 12-lead ECG testing.  It is hospital grade, yet easy to use. 
With seamless integration of state-of-the-art technologies: a super-compact recorder weights only 67g, patented prepositioned electrode strips, user-friendly apps for mobile devices, and HIPAA-compliant cloud, a hospital-quality 12-lead ECG can be completed by anyone, anytime, anywhere. PCA500 provides efficiency, accuracy, consistency, sanitation and better workflow, and makes 12-lead resting ECG testing accessible. It is cleared by the FDA, TFDA, and CE mark , perfect for telemedicine, ER, EMS , CRO, nursing home and remote patient monitoring.

info.tc: 創見將展示全新的PCIe Gen4 x4 M.2固態硬碟，同時具備SLC Mode、PLP斷電保護、TCG Opal等進階功能。SLC Mode提升了醫療器械的穩定運作，PLP斷電保護確保了資料完整性，而TCG Opal則提供了更高層級的資料安全保護，增強醫療數據管理安全性。此外，創見還將展示最新的DDR5 記憶體模組，具備更快的資料處理速度和更大的容量，支援高速應用設備的龐大運算。創見工業級固態硬碟與DRAM記憶體模組提供客製化技術服務，包括寬溫、防護塗層和邊緣補強，以提升產品可靠度和耐用性。同時，還展示儲存裝置遠端管理軟體Control Center和監控軟體Scope Pro，協助醫療機構更有效率地管理資料，提升營運效率。
info.en: Transcend will showcase a new PCIe Gen4 x4 M.2 solid-state drive featuring SLC Mode, PLP power loss protection, and TCG Opal for enhanced data security in medical devices. We'll also unveil DDR5 memory modules for faster data processing and greater capacity. Our industrial-grade SSDs and DRAM modules offer custom features like wide temperature range, conformal coating, and corner bond reinforcement, boosting product reliability. Additionally, we'll present Control Center and Scope Pro software for remote management and monitoring, aiding medical institutions in efficient data management and operational enhancement.

此次展出的全新開發產品包括全方位現金自助繳費機、電子支付自助繳費機、文件處理列印機等各項智能自助設備。這些設備結合了專利的智慧結帳設計，以及完善的後台營運管理系統，為客戶提供高效率的管理營運解決方案。

With our well experienced team, we have become one of the major solution providers in Taiwan’s hospitals.

In the show, you can see our most updated kiosks including all-functioned cash and cashless self-payment kiosks, document processing and printing machines, and other intelligent self-service devices. The product ranges patented daily smart settlement and comprehensive back-stage operational system, all providing our clients highly efficient operation solutions.

Miko IoT醫護管理平台係利用安全及有效的資通訊機制，結合院內HIS、NIS等醫療資訊系統所提供之資料，並整合通訊系統、定位系統及IoT醫療物聯裝置之資訊，統一建構而成的私有雲端智慧醫療核心數據中心。

Miko IoT醫護管理平台採用模組化架構，分別可與MikoDrip點滴監測系統、MikoNIS護理站電子白板、MikoRTLS定位系統、及MikoCALL緊急呼叫系統協作，作為不同系統間資料統合與資訊分享的媒介。Miko IoT透過跨系統的整合與智能運算提供資訊加值服務，例如發生緊急事件時，Miko IoT可將緊急呼叫通話、呼救位置、病患基本資料與醫療註記等訊息，自動傳遞到專責護理師的手機上。透過智慧化流程縮短緊急事件的反應時間，協助醫院提升緊急應變能力與醫療服務品質。

info.tc: 建菱『近紅外線』深層排毒艙PHA901，是擷取紅橙黃可見光(VIS)和近紅外線（NIR），透過獨家專利技術，保留600~1400nm波段，將600nm以下對人體有害的紫外光及對眼睛傷害的藍光波段濾除，並大幅提升光滲透率，讓人體大量吸收近紅外光能量，激活細胞內粒線體，提升人體核心溫度達38°C～40°C，提升免疫力，啟動自我修復功能，並透過『皮脂腺』大量排汗，排出對身體有害之酸性物質、自由基及重金屬等，而艙內運作溫度卻始終保持在溫和的33°C左右，對身體不會有灼熱感或產生熱效應，不同於傳統採高環境溫度，讓使用者排汗排毒，造成不舒適的感覺。PHA901為『全波長』之光熱療設備，有別於坊間採LED燈「單一波長」之方式，對人體吸收光能量的效果更具完整性及全面性。

info.tc:
耳寶6K5A助聽器設計方便靈活，其脖掛式的設計讓使用者在運動和工作時都能方便攜帶不怕掉，對於年長者而言也不用擔心因體積小而容易弄丟，磁吸式設計更能方便收納耳機。

藍芽功能更方便使用者在助聽器功能和視聽功能自由切換，可同時連接兩台裝置，不論是用平板觀看影片或是用手機接聽電話皆沒問題，在各種模式間自由使用。

數位式音源處理細膩度增加並具降噪模式，可在四種不同環境下選擇，不論是安靜的室內空間、吵雜的戶外環境、與人對話或是在開車中皆能調整接受的音量和降噪屏蔽，讓使用者在隨時隨地都方便使用。

秉持人人都能使用並且用得好的原則，脖掛型大電量充一次電便可連續使用十個小時，且價錢實惠，為第一等級醫療器材。
info.en:
The 6K5A hearing aid is designed for convenience and flexibility. Its neckband design allows users to carry it easily during exercise and work without fear of it falling off. For the elderly, there's no need to worry about losing it due to its small size. The magnetic design also makes it easy to store the earphones.

The Bluetooth function allows users to switch freely between hearing aid and audio-visual functions. It can connect to two devices simultaneously, making it easy to watch videos on a tablet or answer calls on a phone, and switch between different modes as needed.

The digital sound processing increases the fineness and includes a noise reduction mode. Users can choose from four different environments: quiet indoor spaces, noisy outdoor environments, conversations, or driving. This allows for volume and noise reduction adjustments, making it convenient to use anytime, anywhere.

Adhering to the principle that everyone can use it well, the neckband model has a large battery capacity that can be used continuously for ten hours on a single charge. It is affordable, classified as a first-class medical device, and eligible users can receive hearing aid subsidies.

info.tc: BRCA核酸檢測試劑及分析系統結合了高效篩檢與自動化數據分析，提供快速便捷的解決方案。BRCA1/2 篩檢試劑套組即開即用，與帆宣自動化配液系統兼容，簡化操作流程，讓檢驗過程更加快速。X1 Sequencing核酸數據分析軟體則具備批量數據處理能力，6分鐘內生成篩檢報告，介面直觀易操作，並利用datasense的高效運算，提供最佳的使用體驗。
info.en: The BRCA gene screening kit and analysis system combines efficient screening with automated data analysis to provide a fast and convenient solution. The BRCA1/2 screening kit is ready-to-use and compatible with Marketech's automated liquid handling system, simplifying the workflow and speeding up the testing process. The X1 Sequencing offers batch data processing, generating a screening report within 6 minutes. Its user-friendly interface is intuitive and easy to operate, while the integration with Datasense's high-performance computing ensures an optimized user experience.

 堪稱是近幾年的流行病防疫史上的兩大發明，其一是配備有袋進袋出過濾器的負壓病房，另一
是配備有超薄水平層流式迷你型風車過濾器系統，與多重媒介箱內連續滅菌裝置的防疫診所，前者是提供病患一個安全的治療環境，後者則可提供醫師們一個安全看診的工作環境。不論來看診的人，為一般疾病或傳染性疾病患者，其均可成為醫生看診時之安全屏障。
info.en:
Medical Recirculating Ultraviolet Air Purifier (spaceAIR+)
There are granted to be the most important two media events of taking precaution against communal
epidemical disease. One of them is negative pressure separated patient room with bag-in & bag-out filter
system. And the other one is “ACiC” (Anti-Cross infection Clinic) with Horizontal Laminar Flow Super Mini
Fan Filter Unit. The former one provides the most safety environment for patients to be cured, and the
later one preventing doctors from being triggered disease crossly by infectious patients.

info.tc:
直得科技除了在現有的線性滑軌、線性馬達、線性模組、編碼器、驅動器繼續進行尺寸擴充與規格提升以外，在2021開始也正式推出DB0、S0微型六軸機器手臂與cpcStudio軟體PLC，更憑藉其優越的機電整合能力，奠定基礎機械設計，將整個產品服務範圍推展至不同層次水平。其中cpcRobot更拿下美國2021 LEAP Awards的金牌獎。
隨著工業4.0的到來，代表著更多產業自動化、智慧化的需求，而cpc 正是智慧自動化與高精度產業關鍵技術的專業製造與開發者，
info.en:
In addition, cpc has expanded the product portfolio of the existing linear guides, linear motors, linear stages, encoders, and drives. In 2021, the six-axis miniature robotic arms DB0, S0, and the software PLC cpcStudio were also officially launched. Its superior mechanical and electrical integration capabilities have laid the foundation for mechanical design and expanded the entire range of products and services to various levels. Among them, cpcRobot won the gold medal at the 2021 LEAP Awards in the United States.
The advent of Industry 4.0 represents the need for more industrial automation and intelligence. cpc is a professional manufacturer and developer of key technologies for intelligent automation and the high-precision industry. As the old saying goes, a tree is not afraid of a violent typhoon because its roots are firmly rooted. cpc provides high-quality linear guide, linear motor, linear motor stage, industrial robot, mini robotic arm, sub-system, and software PLC products, which will be able to respond to the rapid progress of the whole global market and help customers achieve more high -End product requirements.

info.tc: 百視美成立於2009年，專注於開發、生產與銷售創新的醫療器材與醫療電子解決方案，具有完整並有經驗的研發、生產、 行銷與售服團隊。百視美為QMS認證、提供設計、銷售、代工、生產服務的醫材廠商，此次展會除展出自行開發的產品(攜帶式12導程心電圖機、醫療螢幕、高電量醫療電池、遠距醫療諮詢車等)，更將展示百視美在生理訊號處理技術、醫療器材微小化設計、資料傳輸及醫療IT整合的專業，一站式設計生產醫療器才的能力，提供與現有醫療系統整合的完整解決方案，改善醫療效率及滿足因應疫情而產生的遠距需求。
info.en: BriteMED, established in 2009, is dedicated to manufacturing innovative medical devices and electronic medical solutions that improve clinical workflow and enhance patient care. As the QMS-certified manufacturer, BriteMED is providing services of design, contract manufacturing, distribution, and production. At this tradeshow, BriteMED will showcase 12-lead portable ECG, medical monitor, medical battery, and tele-consultation workstation. BriteMED will also present the expertise in vital sign processing and medical IT, and the one-stop design & production capability to satisfy the rising requirement of integrated electrical medical solutions and telemedicine services.

org.tc: 名峰科技股份有限公司

info.tc: 名峰科技的VIROCRUSH專利技術最初是為解決醫療客戶對產品抗菌抗病毒的需求而投入研究及開發，以幫助減少產品在環境使用上可能造成的細菌及病毒感染，經過數年艱辛的研究開發，於2019年底正式完成製程研發並開始啟動導入量產階段，而後不久則適逢全球新冠肺炎的爆發，名峰期許VIROCRUSH技術能為全球對抗病毒的努力盡一份力!
info.en: Mingfeng Technology's VIROCRUSH patented technology was initially invested in research and development to address the needs of medical customers for antibacterial and antiviral products, to help reduce bacterial and viral infections that may be caused by product use in the environment.

org.tc: 矽響先創科技股份有限公司

info.tc: 運用最新科技AIoT和各式微感測裝置，整合人們外在運動及身體內部的感測資訊，提供AI 分析後的整合資訊；可作為個人健康管理、遠距醫療、預防醫學及運動管理的平台。實現透過物聯網穿戴裝置，提供所有健康及運動管理需求者，最舒適的無感穿戴、以及最實用的健康數據，隨時隨地守護您和家人的健康！
info.en: use the latest technology AIoT and various micro-sensory devices to integrate people's external movement and internal sensory information and provide integrated information after AI analysis. We strive to build wearable and portable products as a platform for telemedicine, preventive medicine, and exercise management. Through the Internet of Things (IoT) wearable devices, we are able to satisfy all health and exercise management needs and provide the most comfortable and senseless device to produce the most practical health data. We aim to protect the health of you and your family anytime and anywhere and pursue innovative technology and business models that create products that contribute to society as well as enhance the value of our company.

專業的人體組成分析儀也是本次展出的一大亮點，現場將會開放體驗使用，歡迎關注於健康的人士，一同前來體驗。

org.tc: 台灣共振波研發股份有限公司

info.tc:
台灣共振波研發股份有限公司(Taiwan Resonant Waves Research Corp.; TRWR)是一家以台灣為中心、放眼國際的生物電子藥公司，致力於提供患者更好的醫療照護模式，並針對代謝、免疫及神經相關的慢性疾病提出創新的輔助治療解決方案。此創新療法透過可攜帶非侵入式微電流神經電刺激裝置，將含有特定頻率排列組合的微弱電脈衝傳導至人體內，以達到慢性疾病輔助治療效果。

TRWR 第2型糖尿病生物電子藥技術，輔助第2型糖尿病患者穩定血糖波動，做為全球無類似品的創新醫材，第三等級醫療器材查驗登記審查中。
TRWR 第1型糖尿病生物電子藥技術，完成延緩第1型糖尿病發生率的臨床前驗證，正在進行相關治療機制的了解。
TRWR 疼痛生物電子藥技術，“辰波共振保健”經皮神經電刺激器，已取得第二等級醫療器材上市許可證。
TRWR 睡眠障礙生物電子藥技術，完成改善睡眠品質及阻塞型睡眠呼吸中止症的前導性臨床試驗。

我們正在積極尋找策略合作夥伴，以加速我們的治療技術在全球市場的商品化。
info.en:
Taiwan Resonant Waves Research Corp. (TRWR), a Taiwan-based bioelectronic medicines company with global healthcare perspective, aims to offer patients better health care options with innovative complementary therapy solutions to treat metabolic, immune, and neurological related chronic diseases. This novel treatment involves the use of a non-invasive and portable microcurrent electrical nerve stimulation device to deliver mild electrical impulse stimulations in specific proprietary frequency combinations to the human body to complementary treat different chronic diseases.

-TRWR Type 2 Diabetes Bioelectronic Medicine: Currently undergoing regulatory market approval review by Taiwan FDA as a new medical device with no predicate in the world with indication of glycemic variability reduction.
-TRWR Type 1 Diabetes Bioelectronic Medicine: Completed pre-clinical validation on disease onset delay with mechanism of therapeutic action studies in progress.
-TRWR Pain Bioelectronic Medicine: Obtained class II medical device market approval from Taiwan FDA as “Dragon Waves Resonant Home Care” Electronic Nerve Stimulator.
-TRWR Sleep Disorder Bioelectronic Medicine: Completed pilot clinical trials for sleep quality improvement and obstructive sleep apnea treatment.

We are actively looking for strategic partnership opportunities to accelerate the commercialization of our treatments in the global market.

info.tc:
設有100,000等級(ISO-8)射出成型無塵室，備置歐洲進口微量供料器與射出機台，搭配液態矽膠(LSR)冷澆道系統，能有效節省原料損耗，成本降幅在昂貴醫療原料上尤其顯著。
多年來陸續投入增設實驗室儀器，協助客戶更便利地蒐集測試數據。亦有多條產線進行機構組裝。
具備醫療器材品質管理系統(ISO 13485)及食品安全管理系統(ISO 22000)之認證，及超過三十年的模具設計開發經驗，提供台灣在地專業服務。
info.en:
Using Europe-made precise dosing systems and injection molding machines, along with LSR (liquid silicone rubber) cold runner systems, we can efficiently save material from loss, and the reduction is especially significant in pricey medical materials.
Manufacturing in class 100,000 (ISO-8) clean rooms, our injection molding technique is suitable for plastic and LSR (liquid silicone rubber) parts for medical purposes.
We've been investing in various testing equipment to assist our customers in gathering data more easily; and assembly lines to conduct mechanical assembling.
Certificated in the medical device quality management system (ISO 13485) and food safety management system (ISO 22000).
With over 30 years of experience in injection mold development, we are here to provide you with our professionalism and services locally in Taiwan.

org.tc: 財團法人國家實驗研究院台灣儀器科技研究中心
org.en: Taiwan Instrument Research Institute, National Applied Research Laboratories

info.tc: 台灣儀器科技研究中心是國內唯一可協助學術界理工醫農各領域，開發前瞻研究所需客製化特殊儀器設備的單位，秉持創新精進技術、技術精進服務之動力，提供產學界儀器技術支援與創新應用服務，亦為台灣首創提供一站式醫材開發驗證輔導的單位，為學界研發創意商品化的夢工廠，本次呈現生醫量能與協助新創公司技術升級之成果展示。
info.en: TIRI is the only organization that can provide advanced　instrumentation research and related instrument system innovations for the fields, including science, engineering, biomedical and agricultural science, etc. By holding the belief of“Drive Technology Innovation to Promote Academic Research,” TIRI assists the industry, academia and research organizations with instrument technology solutions and innovative application services. It is also the first organization to offer one-stop services for medical devices development, consultation, test and verification. Serving as a national dream team, TIRI is dedicated to assisting the academia in commercializing their creative ideas. Introductions of accelerators and start-up teams, with their products and achievements.

org.tc: 財團法人國家實驗研究院國家實驗動物中心
org.en: National Applied Research Laboratories National Laboratory Animal Center

info.tc: 國研院動物中心秉持著「品質第一，福祉優先」的核心精神，提供生物醫學研究與生技藥品測試需要的臨床前動物試驗資源與標準化環境，在科學應用與動物福祉雙軌並進的基礎上，提供多元化的技術服務及教育訓練課程，滿足生醫研究需求，提高臨床前試驗效率。配合國家生技發展政策，國研院動物中心進駐重要生技發展群落，依在地生技研究與產業發展特色，支援產業界與學研界之生醫研發、新藥開發及醫療器材發展。
info.en:
The National Laboratory Animal Center (NLAC) was established in 1994 as the first large-scale internationally-qualified supply unit for specific pathogen free (SPF) laboratory rodents in Taiwan.
We serve as an animal breeding and testing environment, pre-clinical evaluation of new drugs and biotechnology products, microbiota-related research and medical devices validation. In the same time,we also support innovation in relation to the 3R principles (Replacement, Reduction, and Refinement), and promote alternative methods and alternative technologies to animal testing. NLAC also provides specialized courses for caretakers, technicians, researchers, facility managers and laboratory animal veterinarian to improve the development of biomedical researches.

org.tc: 財團法人國家實驗研究院國家高速網路與計算中心
org.en: 財團法人國家實驗研究院國家高速網路與計算中心

info.tc: 國網中心所具備的台灣杉系列超級電腦，提供包含生命科學、農業與醫學、自然科學、工程與人文研究在內的先進科技研究。服務項目包含CPU HPC、GPU HPC、CPU及GPU虛擬機，各類儲存及備份設備，提供全方位資訊技術服務。國網中心具備全台最大開放申請使用的超級電腦，支援台灣在生命科學、農業與醫學領域的科學研究，讓國內研究學者跨越資訊技術之障礙，提供基因體及核酸序列、蛋白質結構等，生物化學及分子生物學等所需的昂貴分析軟體與硬體，以免費或以時計費之方式，分攤建置經費，達到資源共享以成就科學研究之目的。本次所展示的國家生醫數位資料與分析運算雲端服務平台提供以生醫專用之計算與儲存設施及分析平台為主的資訊服務，除了涵蓋生醫巨量資料分析所需要，具備CPU與 GPU以及大記憶體節點的平行計算叢集、高速平行化檔案系統、異地備份的設施服務外，也包含各式基因體開源分析軟體平台或客製化服務，以及系統生物分析相關之QIAGEN IPA商用軟體資料庫服務，為了加速基因體二級分析工作，我們也提供了illumina DRAGEN與NVIDIA Parabricks加速服務。
info.en: NCHC in Taiwan operates a series of supercomputers, including the Taiwan Sugon series. These supercomputers support advanced scientific research in fields such as life sciences, agriculture, medicine, natural sciences, engineering, and humanities. The showcased National Biomedical Digital Data and Analysis Cloud Service Platform primarily provides information services related to biomedical research. It includes specialized computing and storage facilities for biomedical data analysis, parallel computing clusters with CPU and GPU nodes, high-speed parallel file systems, and geographically distributed backup services. Additionally, the platform offers various open-source genomic analysis software tools and customized services, as well as access to the QIAGEN IPA commercial software database for systems biology analysis. To accelerate genomic secondary analysis tasks, the platform also provides acceleration services using Illumina DRAGEN and NVIDIA Parabricks.

org.tc: 國家科學及技術委員會新竹科學園區管理局

info.tc: 新竹科學園區轄屬六個衛星園區，分別是新竹、竹南、銅鑼、龍潭、宜蘭與新竹生物醫學園區等科學園區，總開發面積1,375公頃，目前所有衛星學園區已有廠商進駐並開始營運。截至目前，核准廠商數已經超過600家，員工超過16萬人，近年平均營業額均突破兆元。園區產業共分六大類：積體電路產業、電腦及周邊產業、通訊產業、光電產業、精密機械產業及生物技術產業。其中積體電路產業之產值佔園區總產值達7成，為園區第一大產業，光電產業營業額佔園區總產值近2成，為園區第二大產業；餘為精密機械產業、電腦及周邊產業，通訊產業及生物技術產業等。

org.tc: 醫乘智慧有限公司

info.tc:
尿液細胞學檢查，是一種非侵入式的尿液檢測。是排除膀胱癌造成血尿的第一線檢查。目前仰賴細胞病理醫檢師以及細胞病理醫師在顯微鏡下進行質化的檢驗。若無法排除正常，臨床醫師依據臨床資訊及尿液細胞學檢測結果，會安排侵入式膀胱鏡檢查。膀胱鏡，對於接受檢查的病患而言，是需要局部麻醉，不僅不舒服且會感到恐懼。如何減少膀胱鏡侵入性檢查所帶來的身心不適，但又不希望遺漏任何可疑的病灶，在平衡檢查帶來的不適，檢查時間，還有檢查的正確性上，是非常的重要且不容易的。
醫乘智慧(AIxMed Inc.) 開發AI 軟體協助分析尿液細胞影像，搭配量化數據，提供病理醫師膀胱癌尿液細胞檢查參考，期能在尿液細胞學以及各種細胞學檢測上，帶來平台式的解決方案。
info.en: Established in 2018, AIxMed is pioneering a transformative approach to cancer diagnosis and monitoring with our advanced computational cytology platform. Our platform simplifies clinical workflows and significantly enhances healthcare quality by providing vital decision support during clinical diagnosis and monitoring. Our flagship solution,

此系列產品針對兩大族群(曬後修護、長期照護)打造
以獨創魚皮萃取技術，打造膠原蛋白為基底的修護產品。

極端氣候的環境下，面對烈陽，防曬僅能達到初步紫外線的防護。我們希望帶給消費者曬後修護的觀念，傳達在烈陽活動下內外補水對肌膚保護的重要性。以達到恢復肌膚水分與彈性，減少老化以及其他皮膚疾病問題。
關於長期照護，肌膚狀態的維持總是令照護者用盡心力。我們為此設計出幫助肌膚補水與滋潤的產品，讓長期治療或長期臥床患者可以用最簡單的塗抹方式照護肌膚，減輕照護人的負擔，同時也給患者一個舒服的治療環境。
info.en: This series of products, Collagen Revitalizing Repair Cream, is designed for two main purposes: post-sun repair and long-term care. Developed using an innovative fish skin extraction technique, it is based on collagen protein. In extreme climates, sunscreen offers only basic UV protection. We emphasize the concept of post-sun repair, advocating for hydration and skin protection after sun exposure to restore moisture, elasticity, and reduce aging and other skin issues. Additionally, it is designed for long-term care, providing essential hydration and nourishment with a simple application method to ease the burden on caregivers and offer comfort to bedridden patients during treatment.

This breakthrough treatment for multiple sclerosis is now undergoing Phase I and IIa clinical trials in Taiwan. Starting in September 2023, we have initiated SIV for patient enrollment. This year, we showcased UMSC01 at the BIO International Convention and the Japan Bioindustry Association Expo, drawing attention from numerous global companies. Get to know Ever Supreme and our pioneering efforts in medical innovation.

我們正在持續進行優化樣本處理與文庫製備自動化流程的計畫，並與國內醫學中心合作，共同整合開發文庫製備試劑。目標是協助醫學實驗室實現次世代定序檢測的自動化，成為台灣罕見的整合設備與試劑開發廠商。未來我們預計能夠進一步推廣次世代定序技術在臨床的應用範圍，將次世代定序普及於區域醫院及大型醫事機構。

info.en: AcuSense Biomedical's smart healthcare AIoT system integrates IoT through a gateway and AI technologies. Utilizing Bluetooth, it connects multiple physiological measurement devices to the gateway, which subsequently uploads the data to the cloud via WiFi, achieving digitalization of healthcare data. Coupled with AI technology, our system provides an early warning system, predicting occurrence rates and delivering real-time alerts, thereby enabling preventive measures before incidents occur. Application of the solution includes areas such as hemodialysis, smart hospital rooms, and telemedicine. Our solution offers a mutually beneficial safety solution for clinical settings, considering manpower and cost-effectiveness.

org.tc: 柏瑞醫股份有限公司_塑膠中心

info.tc:
1.	骨鬆AI輔助篩檢系統
本產品是用來讀取醫療影像及協助分析骨密和骨鬆症狀之軟 體，透過將 X-ray 所輸出的醫療影像進行影像傳輸、儲存、後處理以及顯示醫療影像資料等功能，將其轉換成為顯示骨質密度和骨鬆輔助分析醫療影像資料，以協助醫師評估骨質疏鬆症、判斷 骨折風險及其他導致骨骼密度低的症狀。
2.	精準醫療次世代智慧自動化實驗室解決方案 
精準醫療智慧實驗室結合自動化設備與 AI 技術，提升基因檢測效率。自動核酸萃取機確保DNA/RNA 質量，自動液體配置機精準混合試劑和樣本，增強實驗重現性。自動文庫純化機在基因測序前淨化 DNA 片段，保障測序質量。專注於 BRCA 1/2 伴隨式 診斷，重要於乳腺癌和卵巢癌早期診斷與個性化治療。AI 基因分析軟體透過深度學習分析基因變異提供精準診斷。此方案顯著提高基因檢測準確度助力現代醫學研究與臨床治療。

Our primary services include AI imaging recognition systems for osteoporosis and cell and NGS precision medical smart laboratory solutions.

org.tc: 俊質生醫股份有限公司

info.tc: SAA奈米精準蛋白質檢測-胃癌及大腸癌精準檢測專家。目前癌症篩檢相關技術與服務在市面上已行之有年，但其準確度卻最為人詬病。SAA蛋白質檢測只要抽一管血，不用空腹，不用清腸，不用麻醉，透過獨家奈米粒子的純化，使我們能針對血液中微量的SAA蛋白質進行質譜分析，並利用自行研發的AI生物判讀軟體分析癌症風險，相較於傳統只看總量的方式更能有效的辨認癌症，目前SAA蛋白質檢測針對大腸癌篩檢的整體準確率是91%，針對胃癌篩檢的整體準確率是85%，已經相當接近腸胃鏡檢查的結果，又不需要忍受侵入性檢查的不便利及不舒服，是腸胃癌早期篩檢相當優良的替代性選擇。
info.en: SAA Nano Precision Protein Test-Gastric Cancer and CRC Precision Test Expert. Cancer screening-related technologies and services have been available on the market for many years, but their accuracy is the most criticized. SAA Protein Test requires only a tube of blood draw, and it does not require fasting and bowel cleansing in advance, and no anesthesia required. Through the purification of exclusive nanoparticles, we can target and analyze trace amount of SAA in the blood. The protein is analyzed by high-end mass spectrometry, and the self-developed AI biological interpretation software is used to analyze the cancer risk. SAA Protein Test has an overall detection accuracy of 91% for Colorectal Cancer and 85% for Gastric Cancer, which is pretty much close to the result of Colonoscopy and Endoscopy. No need to endure the inconvenience and discomfort of invasive examination, SAA Protein Test is an excellent alternative for early screening of Colorectal Cancer and Gastric Cancer.

org.tc: 達運精密工業股份有限公司

info.tc: 目前獸醫臨床檢測腎臟損傷標記蛋白-嗜中性白血球明膠酶相關脂質運載蛋白(NGAL)以酵素鏈接免疫吸附法(ELISA)為主，ELISA需樣本前處理、抗體且耗時長，故本研究開發一表面增強拉曼(SERS)技術檢測平台，由達運進行結構設計與製作基板、中興大學檢測，並比對獸醫院之診斷結果。SERS優點為不需前處理、直接檢測(無抗體與無表面接枝處理)、檢體用量極少(20 μL)、快速檢測(< 5 min)等，後續有極大之臨床應用可行性。
info.en: Currently, veterinary clinical testing of kidney injury marker protein - neutrophil gelatinase-associated lipocalin (NGAL) is mainly based on enzyme-linked immunosorbent assay (ELISA). ELISA requires sample preprocessing, antibodies and is time-consuming, so this study developed A surface-enhanced Raman (SERS) technology detection platform, the structure was designed and manufactured by Dayun, and the substrate was tested by National Chung Hsing University, and the diagnostic results of the veterinary hospital were compared. The advantages of SERS are that it does not require pre-treatment, direct detection (no antibodies and no surface grafting treatment), very small sample volume (20 μL), rapid detection (< 5 min), etc., and has great potential for clinical application in the future.

精準醫療次世代智慧自動化實驗室解決方案：
精準醫療智慧實驗室結合自動化設備與技術，提升基因檢測效率。自動核酸萃取機確保質量，自動液體配置機精準混合試劑和樣本，增強實驗重現性。自動文庫純化機在基因測序前淨化片段，保障測序質量。專注於伴隨式診斷，重要於乳腺癌和卵巢癌早期診斷與個性化治療。基因分析軟體透過深度學習分析基因變異提供精準診斷。此方案顯著提高基因檢測準確度助力現代醫學研究與臨床治療。
info.en:
Osteoporosis Auxiliary Screening System: This product is software designed to read medical images and assist in analyzing bone density and osteoporosis symptoms. It features functions such as image transmission, storage, post-processing, and display of medical image data. The software converts output medical images into data that displays bone density and provides auxiliary analysis for osteoporosis, aiding physicians in assessing osteoporosis, determining fracture risk, and diagnosing other conditions that lead to low bone density.

Next-Generation Smart Automated Laboratory Solution for Precision Medicine: The precision medicine smart laboratory integrates automation equipment and technology to enhance the efficiency of genetic testing. An automated nucleic acid extractor ensures sample quality, while an automated liquid handling system precisely mixes reagents and samples to improve experimental reproducibility. An automated library purification machine purifies fragments before gene sequencing, ensuring sequencing quality. This solution focuses on companion diagnostics, which are crucial for early diagnosis and personalized treatment of breast cancer and ovarian cancer. Genetic analysis software uses deep learning to analyze gene variations and provide accurate diagnoses. This solution significantly improves the accuracy of genetic testing, supporting modern medical research and clinical treatment.

info.tc: BD Cardio 是一款專為醫師設計的先進心電圖分析平台，具備多項強大功能，其中針對血鉀異常的分析尤為突出。血鉀水平異常對心臟健康有重大影響，可能導致心律不整等嚴重問題。BD Cardio 透過高效演算法，自動檢測心電圖中與高鉀或低鉀相關的異常，幫助醫師提前識別潛在風險並進行預防。平台還支援即時心電圖數據處理，能快速測量心率、檢測間隔、分析節律變異，並即時生成診斷報告。BD Cardio 採用SaaS（軟體即服務）模式，無需安裝額外軟體，醫療機構只需透過網絡即可輕鬆使用。此外，平台提供線上標記和數據修改功能，能在10分鐘內生成精確報告，極大縮短診斷時間，提升運營效率與臨床診斷的便利性。
info.en: BD Cardio is an advanced ECG analysis platform designed specifically for physicians, offering powerful features with a focus on potassium abnormality detection. Abnormal potassium levels can significantly impact heart health, potentially leading to dangerous conditions such as arrhythmias. BD Cardio uses a highly efficient algorithm to automatically detect ECG abnormalities related to hyperkalemia or hypokalemia, helping physicians identify and prevent potential risks early. The platform supports real-time ECG data processing, providing rapid heart rate measurements, interval detection, and rhythm variation analysis, all while generating diagnostic reports. With its SaaS (Software-as-a-Service) model, BD Cardio requires no additional software installation, allowing easy access through the web.

info.en: AcuSense Biomedical's smart healthcare AIoT system integrates IoT through a gateway and AI technologies. Utilizing Bluetooth, it connects multiple physiological measurement devices to the gateway, which subsequently uploads the data to the cloud via WiFi, achieving digitalization of healthcare data. Coupled with AI technology, our system provides an early warning system, predicting occurrence rates and delivering real-time alerts, thereby enabling preventive measures before incidents occur. Application of the solution includes areas such as hemodialysis, smart hospital rooms, and telemedicine. Our solution offers a mutually beneficial safety solution for clinical settings, considering manpower and cost-effectiveness.

info.tc: SAA奈米精準蛋白質檢測-胃癌及大腸癌精準檢測專家。目前癌症篩檢相關技術與服務在市面上已行之有年，但其準確度卻最為人詬病。SAA蛋白質檢測只要抽一管血，不用空腹，不用清腸，不用麻醉，透過獨家奈米粒子的純化，使我們能針對血液中微量的SAA蛋白質進行質譜分析，並利用自行研發的AI生物判讀軟體分析癌症風險，相較於傳統只看總量的方式更能有效的辨認癌症，目前SAA蛋白質檢測針對大腸癌篩檢的整體準確率是91%，針對胃癌篩檢的整體準確率是85%，已經相當接近腸胃鏡檢查的結果，又不需要忍受侵入性檢查的不便利及不舒服，是腸胃癌早期篩檢相當優良的替代性選擇。
info.en: SAA Nano Precision Protein Test-Gastric Cancer and CRC Precision Test Expert. Cancer screening-related technologies and services have been available on the market for many years, but their accuracy is the most criticized. SAA Protein Test requires only a tube of blood draw, and it does not require fasting and bowel cleansing in advance, and no anesthesia required. Through the purification of exclusive nanoparticles, we can target and analyze trace amount of SAA in the blood. The protein is analyzed by high-end mass spectrometry, and the self-developed AI biological interpretation software is used to analyze the cancer risk. SAA Protein Test has an overall detection accuracy of 91% for Colorectal Cancer and 85% for Gastric Cancer, which is pretty much close to the result of Colonoscopy and Endoscopy. No need to endure the inconvenience and discomfort of invasive examination, SAA Protein Test is an excellent alternative for early screening of Colorectal Cancer and Gastric Cancer.

info.tc:
1.	骨鬆AI輔助篩檢系統
本產品是用來讀取醫療影像及協助分析骨密和骨鬆症狀之軟 體，透過將 X-ray 所輸出的醫療影像進行影像傳輸、儲存、後處理以及顯示醫療影像資料等功能，將其轉換成為顯示骨質密度和骨鬆輔助分析醫療影像資料，以協助醫師評估骨質疏鬆症、判斷 骨折風險及其他導致骨骼密度低的症狀。
2.	精準醫療次世代智慧自動化實驗室解決方案 
精準醫療智慧實驗室結合自動化設備與 AI 技術，提升基因檢測效率。自動核酸萃取機確保DNA/RNA 質量，自動液體配置機精準混合試劑和樣本，增強實驗重現性。自動文庫純化機在基因測序前淨化 DNA 片段，保障測序質量。專注於 BRCA 1/2 伴隨式 診斷，重要於乳腺癌和卵巢癌早期診斷與個性化治療。AI 基因分析軟體透過深度學習分析基因變異提供精準診斷。此方案顯著提高基因檢測準確度助力現代醫學研究與臨床治療。

info.en:
Airvida E1
Airvida E1 is the world’s first ionic air purifier that comes with noise-canceling earphones. It weighs only 42 grams and is comfortable to wear for hours. With 25dB noise-canceling earphones, it can block out unwanted noises and allow you to immerse yourself in the music. Additionally, Airvida E1 can be placed on its own stand, allowing you to use it as a desktop air purifier even in the office.

Airvida E1 can connect with the Airvida Connect smartphone app, providing real-time information on air pollutants and pollen, along with instant alerts for poor air quality. It also offers 3 levels of negative ions to combat various air pollution conditions.

With an ultra-long battery life of 8 hours, enjoy both premium sound quality and purified air with the Airvida E1 while on the go.

中邑生物科技公司是一家開發天然植萃物成分經皮吸收貼片之生技公司，具備天然物植萃、經皮吸收、財務規劃及企業經營資深專業之人才，專注研究開發功能性經皮貼片，矢志成為國際級天然物經皮貼片創新平台。 本公司研發之貼片產品，能夠輔助調節生理機能，促進新陳代謝，維持人體健康平衡。貼片使用方便不受時間限制，提高使用者生活品質及降低家庭照護成本，達到預防保健的效果。 中邑生技並已獲得上櫃電子公司投資，未來將開發智能貼片穿戴裝置，發展個性化醫療及精準醫療產品。

org.tc: 福芯科技股份有限公司

info.tc:
你值得有更好的電療日記和復健運動的生活型態

我們公司的核心技術就是具有電子電路開發以及高頻率通訊的研發能力，開發全球第一個【居家電療復健運動解決方案】，讓每位個案的運動紀錄和電療模式使用次數、強度、時間的紀錄，主要目的是記錄用戶的使用習慣和模式跟踪日誌。

醫院復健中心所用的大型電療機都是中週波4000Hz以上，但是這些專業的中週波電療機體積大不方便攜帶，而且使用介面複雜，沒有記錄數據的功能。突破傳統的類比式訊號，創新採用數位化、程式化讓2組頻率略略不同的中頻電流互相干擾， 模擬出干擾波特性，達到更佳之治療效果，可以到達人體較深層的軟組織位置，除了能夠緩解疼痛之外，亦能感受到深層指壓按摩放鬆的效果。

攜帶方便的口袋型尺寸，操作簡單，重量只有100公克。居家復健節省來回診所時間，避免群聚感染風險。有效建立醫、病、護三方的連結，補足原本醫療服務缺口。讓病患在遠距醫療、非接觸、在宅電療復健的領域中，提昇個案的完成效率。

We have developed the world's first [UGYM POCKET STIM/REHAB SOLUTIONS], allowing each case to record the exercise and the number, intensity, and time of electrotherapy mode use, the main purpose is to record user usage habits and pattern tracking logs.

Enjoy life without the pain with UGYM POCKET STIM.

info.tc:
卓越先鋒的使命是在協助更多客戶們有效獲得健康!我們重視傳統和現代醫學領域專業,並積極尋找更多契機確保客戶能獲得最佳成果。我們正在努力推廣輔助醫學策略並為消費者提供不僅在醫學領域提供最新科學知識，而且還提供基於證據的天然適應原，這些適應原與醫生開具或建議的處方(處方籤)相輔相成。預計將被用於輔助現有的醫療方案，或作為一個獨立的程序来實現健康。
我們的優勢在於我們的積極且嚴謹的正向開放心態，以及科研領域科學專家知識和醫學專家護理專家們的專業知識。然而，更重要的是，我們能融合現代和
傳統、西方和東方醫學的最佳健康策略，以便將其提供给我們的消費者。
為了更好的實現提供客戶健康照護承諾,卓越先鋒與醫療院所、醫學專家、中醫藥、阿育吠陀醫學和生物技術公司的行業專家合作。與西方醫學的一般做法不同，我們利用我們的醫學技能和專業知識來識別和獲取統合整體醫學中的關鍵組成部分，從而提供更廣泛和更平衡的方式為使用者改善健康。
我們誠摯地邀請您加入全新的健康旅程!以新的方式逐步實踐健康管理目標!
info.en:
The mission of pioneer  is to assist more customers in effectively achieving health! We value expertise in both traditional and modern medicine, and actively seek opportunities to ensure that our customers receive the best outcomes. We are working to promote complementary medical strategies and provide consumers not only with the latest scientific knowledge in the medical field but also with evidence-based natural adaptogens that complement the prescriptions or recommendations provided by doctors. These adaptogens are intended to be used to supplement existing medical regimens or as a standalone approach to achieve health.

Our strength lies in our proactive and rigorous positive mindset, as well as the expertise of our scientific research experts and medical professionals. More importantly, we are able to integrate the best health strategies from both modern and traditional, Western and Eastern medicine, to offer them to our consumers.

**To better fulfill our commitment to providing customers with health care, pioneer collaborates with industry experts from medical institutions, medical specialists, traditional Chinese medicine, Ayurvedic medicine, and biotechnology companies. Unlike the common practices of Western medicine, we use our medical skills and expertise to identify and acquire key components from integrative holistic medicine, thereby offering a broader and more balanced approach to improve the health of our users.

We sincerely invite you to join a new health journey and gradually realize your health management goals in a new way!

info.tc: EliteCell來自美國，專注於高效能、高品質細胞培養基開發與生產，提供全球快速成長的細胞治療市場，穩定、安全、合乎法規的臨床等級細胞培養材料。cGMP廠房建置在美國德州，面向全球。目前已經有美國、中國、台灣等客戶進入人體臨床試驗或是特管法應用。我們產品適用於多種細胞，包含各類幹細胞及免疫細胞。
info.en:
With 10-years experiences, EliteCell aims to providing optimal cell culture solutions for a broad range of cells to support and accelerate the development of cell therapies and regenerative medicines from research to clinic.

EliteCell's cGMP-compliant facility located in Texas, USA.  EliteCell supplies xenogeneic-free serum replacement, serum-free human lymphocytes culture media, primary NK culture kit to the top research and academic institutions as well as biotechnology, cell therapy, and pharmaceutical companies in worldwide.

info.tc:
對於全球目前所面臨的人口老化及照護能量不足的問題，澄風科技推出一套智慧遠端照護系統「SmartCaring T60」。將T60無線生理訊號感測器安裝於病床上方，感測器會以非接觸式方式偵測靜臥於床上病患的生理參數(心率、呼吸率、體溫)及離床偵測，將這些數據以無線方式傳送並儲存於雲端或後端伺服器，且即時顯示於護理站的電子白板，讓醫照護人員可即時掌握病患生理狀況並於緊急事件發生時，可在第一時間做好醫照護處理。
SmartCaring T60為台灣第一件且市場唯一通過TFDA第二等級醫療器材認證的非接觸式生理訊號監測產品，具備非接觸式、保護隱私、偵測持續不中斷等特色，可提升機構住院安全性，醫照護效率及品質，降低機構人員支出成本。目前已臨床應用於國內各大醫院，如三軍總醫院、台北市立聯合醫院等。目前正持續且積極的將產品推廣至各醫療機構及長照中心。

info.tc: 台灣和越南在文化、勞動、工業等經濟發展上已有30年成功合作的經驗，隨著台越雙邊社會經濟的發展，人民健康和醫療的需求快速增長，台越雙邊在醫療及生物醫學科技的發展愈形重要，雙方合作交流的機會也快速成長；因此，為了台越雙方在醫療生技產業能有更大合作開發， 台越醫療生技產業協會於2022年4月23日於台灣台中正式成立。本次集合協會50多個成員的努力，展出再生醫療、智慧醫療及精準醫療相關成果。
info.en: Taiwan and Vietnam have had 30 years of successful cooperation in cultural, labor, and industrial economic development. With the rapid development of the bilateral socio-economy between Taiwan and Vietnam, the demand for healthcare and medical services has been growing rapidly. The development of medical and biotechnological industries in both Taiwan and Vietnam is becoming increasingly important, and opportunities for cooperation and exchange between the two sides are rapidly expanding. Therefore, to further enhance cooperation and development in the medical biotechnology industry between Taiwan and Vietnam, the Taiwan Vietnam Medical Biotech Association (TVMB) was officially established in Taichung, Taiwan on April 23, 2022. This event showcased the efforts of more than 50 members, presenting achievements in regenerative medicine, smart healthcare, and precision medicine.

info.tc: STARBIA701專業型體組成分析儀是應用在生物電阻抗分析(Bioelectrical Impedance Analysis, BIA)上來進行人體測量，利用微量的電流通過人體，再藉由測量身體本身所產生的電阻，利用通過該身體部位產生的電壓信號來推算身體成分的估計值。
info.en: StarBIA 701 is a professional body composition analyzer which uses Bioelectrical Impedance Analysis (BIA) to measure human body. With slightly current through body to evaluate body composisiton.

info.tc:
1. Zen Pro IC-01 全身震動機: 
   • 個人必備的全身振動訓練。
   • 提升身體訓練的表現。
   • 增強身體控制和平衡。
   • 增加血液循環並增強新陳代謝。
   • 改善受壓的肌肉。
   • 運動前和運動後的暖身以放鬆肌肉。

2.Strideout RT-50 IOT 助行器
  • 標準版：	透過內建座椅、收納袋和可折疊設計，增強移動性、穩定性和平衡性，方便運輸和存放
  • 物聯網版本：提高安全性、即時位置追蹤、遠端監控、可調步速和燈光指示器、左右平衡指示器

3. 主動被動訓練器 PA-01
   • 改善活動範圍：被動和主動訓練都可以增強靈活性並增加關節的活動範圍。
   • 肌肉強化：主動訓練有助於增強和強化肌肉，而被動訓練可以防止不動時的肌肉萎縮。
   • 復健支持：這些訓練方法對於從受傷或手術中恢復的個人很有價值，有助於恢復功能和活動能力。
   • 增加循環：這兩種方法都可以增強血液流動和循環，這對於整體健康和康復至關重要。
   • 預防僵硬：被動訓練可以預防關節僵硬，特別是對於行動不便或臥床不起的人。
info.en:
1.Zen Pro IC-01 whole body vibration machine
   • Personal essential whole body vibration training.
   • Improve physical training performance.
   • Improves body control and balance.
   • Increases blood circulation and enhances metabolism.
   • Improves stressed muscles.
   • Warm up before and after exercise to relax muscles.
2.Strideout RT-50 IOT Rollator
   • Standard version: Enhances mobility, stability, and balance with a built-in seat, storage bag, and foldable design for easy transport and storage
   • Iot version:Improved safety, real-time location tracking, remote monitoring, adjustable pace and light indicators, and balance indicators for left and right 

3.Active & Passive Trainer PA-01
   • Improved Range of Motion: Both passive and active training can enhance flexibility and increase the range of motion in joints.
   • Muscle Strengthening: Active training helps build and strengthen muscles, while passive training can prevent muscle atrophy in cases of immobility.
   • Rehabilitation Support: These training methods are valuable for individuals recovering from injuries or surgeries, aiding in the restoration of function and mobility.
   • Increased Circulation: Both methods can enhance blood flow and circulation, which is crucial for overall health and healing.
   • Preventing Stiffness: Passive training can prevent joint stiffness, especially in people with limited mobility or those confined to bed.

info.tc: STARBIA MEDITEK 的產品、技術及營運模式具備嚴謹的醫學背景與新型的數據分析與模型建立、驗證技術。我們推出的體組成分析儀STARBIA 201採用了最新的生物阻抗分析技術，能夠準確測量包括肌肉質量、骨密度、內臟脂肪內的多項關鍵指標。並擁有全球針對銀髮族所特別建立、驗證的體組成測量模型，並結合對應使用者的評估數據庫，客觀且正確地提供受測者的診斷結果的判定，亦可針對不同年齡的使用者進行測量與分析。
info.en: Our body composition analyzer, STARBIA 201, incorporates the latest bioelectrical impedance analysis technology. It can accurately measure multiple key indicators, including muscle mass, bone density, and visceral fat.

info.tc: 依據國健署2017年國民健康訪問調查結果顯示，近9成的長者至少罹患一項以上慢性病，同時罹患兩項及三項以上慢性病的比率分別為63.8%及42.8%。而現有的衛教資訊偏向單一疾病，缺少共病的資訊，多重慢病的日子該怎麼過？「慢病好日子」從生活五大面向，包含治療、照護、用藥、運動和營養，提供共病資訊、病友互動、專家撇步等資訊，邀請慢性病友，一起好好過慢病日子！
info.en: According to the results of the 2017 National Health Interview Survey by Health Promotion Administration, nearly 90% of the elderly suffer from at least one chronic disease, and the rates of suffering from two and three or more chronic diseases at the same time are 63.8% and 42.8% respectively. However, the existing information focuse on a single disease and lacks information on comorbidities. How should we live with multiple chronic diseases?

info.tc:
我們的服務人員將進行一些小實驗，讓您親身了解我們平常在睡眠中是如何接觸到這些過敏源，以及這些過敏源是如何從床墊或大型織物中蔓延到您的居家環境，並在日常中讓我們接觸到這些過敏源。我們將完整地展示整個過程，讓您一窺究竟。
最後服務人員會把您的床墊清乾淨，Ritello會接上POWERBRUSH進行強力拍打以達床墊或大型織物深層的灰塵、皮屑、塵螨被帶到表面，再由Ritello強力
的吸力抽取到水盆中將上述的所有東西困於水中，讓床墊保持乾淨，就能避免接觸到這些過敏源，從而保護您的健康和生活品質。
info.en:
Our service staff will conduct some small experiments to let you understand firsthand how we are exposed to these allergens during sleep, and how these allergens spread from mattresses or large fabrics into your home environment, and in daily life expose us to these allergens. We'll show you the entire process in full so you can have a peek.
Finally, the service staff will clean your mattress. Ritello will connect POWERBRUSH to perform strong beating to reach the dust, dander, and dust mites deep in the mattress or large fabrics and bring them to the surface. Ritello will then use the powerful
The suction power draws all of the above into the water basin and traps all of the above in the water. By keeping the mattress clean, you can avoid contact with these allergens, thereby protecting your health and quality of life.

info.tc:
源自於對截肢後不適的舒緩…
1969年德裔加拿大籍弗瑞德.侃培(Frieder Kempe)先生致力於柏克研發，其原始動機乃是試圖以物理非侵入性方式給予截肢父親舒適的保護。
第一個原型成品於1978年問世，可方便應用在任何需要保護的部位。不僅嘉惠截肢患者，其他如：運動傷害保護、肌肉傷害保護輔助、手術後保護、慢性症保護等，都建議柏克來改善。多年來已贏得多項國際學會與保健團體的肯定。
柏克系列涵蓋全身：護膝、護腰、包巾、護頸、護帽、護臂、保護背心、護腿、護肘、護腕、護手套、護鼻及截肢護套等。
info.en:
Originating from providing relief from the discomfort experienced after amputation...
In 1969, Frieder Kempe, a German-Canadian devoted himself to Farabloc's research and development. His original motivation was to try to provide comfort in a non-invasive way for his amputee father.
The first prototype, introduced in 1978, can be easily applied to any limb that needs protection. Benefiting not only amputatee patients, but in cases such as sports injuries, muscle injuries, post-operative care and chronic injuries; they all see improvement with Farabloc use. Over the years, it has won the recognition of many international societies and health care organizations.
The Farabloc series covers the whole body: knee covers, waist belts, blankets, neck wraps, hats, arm guards, vests, leg guard, elbow guard, wrist-palm guards, gloves, nose covers and amputation protectors etc.

info.tc: 山東卓越生物技術股份有限公司，是以體外診斷產品的研發、生產、銷售為一體的高新技術企業，總部及生產基地位於山東煙臺，並在北京設有研發中心。公司是國內較早從事血液細胞分析儀配套試劑的公司，血液學實驗室連續10年以上參加衛生部臨檢中心的質控計劃均獲得優秀成績，已為多家省市臨檢中心提供血液學室間質評產品。Hemax系列全自動血液細胞分析儀，包括Hemax3系列（Hemax320/330）及Hemax5系列（Hemax530/CT/AL）以及以集成生物傳感器為核心技術的CBS/KS系列電解質分析儀質量穩定、結果準確，在各級中小規模臨床實驗室的使用中獲得了滿意的評價。
info.en: B&E Diagnostics specializing in electrolyte analyzer/hematology reagent/hematology analyzer from China. With manufacturing facility in China and India, B&E is certified by ISO13485 and ISO9001, marketing and selling its products in more than 60 countries worldwide.

org.tc: 香港貿易發展局

info.tc:
香港貿易發展局(香港貿發局)成立於1966年，是負責促進、協助和發展香港及當地貿易的法定機構。目前在世界各地設有50多個辦事處，致力推廣香港作為雙向環球投資及商業樞紐。

亞洲醫療健康高峰論壇 (ASGH) 為亞洲首屈一指的健康創新與投資盛會，由香港特別行政區政府與香港貿易發展局聯合主辦，是一個一站式跨學科平台，匯集所有利益相關者——從政策制定者到醫療保健專家，再到著名學術界和有影響力的商界領袖，以及來自世界各地的主要行業參與者、創新新創公司和投資者，交流見解、探索機會並在多元化和充滿活力的醫療保健領域開展合作。

2024年第四屆有超過80位國際知名演講者，吸引了來自40個國家和地區的2,800多名參與者。 安排了超過360場一對一會議，為投資者與全球醫療保健項目進行配對。

2025年亞洲醫療健康高峰論壇，將於5月26-27日在香港會議展覽中心舉辦。
info.en:
The Hong Kong Trade Development Council (HKTDC) is a statutory body established in 1966 to promote, assist and develop Hong Kong's and local's trade. With 50 offices globally, the HKTDC promotes Hong Kong as a two-way global investment and business hub.

Positioned as Asia’s premier event on health innovation and investment, the Asia Summit on Global Health (ASGH) jointly organised by the Government of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region and the Hong Kong Trade Development Council is a one-stop cross-disciplinary platform that will bring together all stakeholders – from policymakers to healthcare experts to renowned academia and influential business leaders, together with key industry players, innovative start-ups, and investors from around the world to exchange insights, explore opportunities and collaborate on the diverse and dynamic healthcare sector.

The fourth edition in 2024 featured over 80 internationally renowned speakers and attracted more than 2,800 participants from 40 countries and regions. Over 360 one-to-one meetings matching investors with global healthcare projects were arranged.

2025  Asia Summit on Global Health (ASGH) 
Dates: 26-27 May 2025
Venue: Hong Kong Convention and Exhibition Centre (HKCEC)
Format: Physical Conference with Exhibition, Deal-making and Project Pitching

org.tc: 菘啟工業股份有限公司

info.tc:
999年創立以來，菘啟於短短十年內，由國內小型熱電偶製造廠迅速發展壯大，垂直整合成為全方位溫控元件設備國際供應商，以提供品質優異的產品及最優質的服務，享譽業界。服務對象含括國內外航太、半導體、太陽能、LED、發電廠、石化、鋼鐵、水泥、食品等廣大的高科技及傳統產業客戶群。

        菘啟多年來秉持「持續提升品質、滿足客戶需求」之信念，由經驗豐富的工程團隊，針對不同產業客戶所面臨各種嚴苛的製程環境，提供製程溫控方面所需的最佳系統產品設計及改善方案。多樣化的客製產品，可應用於攝氏-200至2,200度以上廣泛的溫度環境。

       此外為提供客戶更加完善的服務，菘啟於2001年設立儀校中心﹙ISO/IEC 17025認證溫度校正實驗室﹚。此中心為獨立營運單位，提供客戶客觀可靠的溫度校正服務。校驗項目包含熱電偶、熱電阻﹙RTD﹚、玻璃溫度計、測溫儀器設備等，為目前國內校正範圍最廣，能力最強的二級溫度實驗室。
info.en:
Thermoway Industrial Co., Ltd first established in 1995 in Taipei, Taiwan. We started as a small domestic workshop with quality made thermocouple and RTD products. Over the years, we continue to grow and expand to become the leading manufacturer and supplier in the temperature measurement industry. Today, we have a full range of temperature control equipment including Thermocouple, RTD, Temperature Instrument, Thermometer, Thermographic System, Temperature Sensor, Temperature Parts & Accessories, Connector, Thermocouple Wire, Protection Tube, Wireless Transmitter, Thermocouple Wafer, Profile T/C, Torch Heater, Controllers, and Noble Metal.

Our Team

org.tc: Arbelos Genomics Inc

info.tc:
Arbelos Genomics 致力於銜接台美之間創新且實惠的的分子檢測解決方案，包含臨床驗證實驗室一站式設立、分子檢測開發、商務資源拓展、技術性盡職調查及投資、及醫藥法規諮詢等等。 

我們的 LabStart Solutions為實驗室提供BOT模型(Build-Operate-Transfer) 以及全面上市輔導籌備，包括實驗室規劃設計、人力資源配置和訓練以及品質管理驗證確效和CLIA/CAP取證等服務。 

我們也提供台美市場戰略性商務資源拓展服務，如技術導向的盡職調查和投資諮詢，幫助創新領導者將突破性醫藥檢測解決方案推向臨床應用及市場。 

我們的使命是讓分子檢測變得親民，解決醫療檢測困境並改善病患生活品質。Arbelos Genomics 專注於品質、創新、與實踐，是您將商業想法轉化為臨床解決方案並能落實上市的最佳夥伴。
info.en:
Arbelos Genomics is committed to advancing patient care through innovative and accessible genomic testing solutions. We specialize in bringing the value of Taiwanese companies to the US market, offering a comprehensive, one-stop solution for clinical laboratory setup, molecular assay development, strategic business development, technical due diligence, investment advisory, and regulatory consultation.

Our LabStart Solutions provide a BOT (Build-Operate-Transfer) model, supporting laboratories with market readiness through comprehensive services, including lab design, staffing, validation, quality management system accreditation, and CLIA/CAP certification.

We also offer strategic business development services, such as technical due diligence and investment advisory, to help innovative leaders bring groundbreaking healthcare solutions to market.

Our mission is to make high-quality genomic testing accessible, addressing real-world healthcare challenges and improving patient outcomes. With a focus on quality, innovation, and practical solutions, Arbelos Genomics is your ideal partner in transforming business ideas into clinical realities and successfully bringing them to market.

org.tc: 加拿大駐臺北貿易辦事處

info.tc: 加拿大駐台北貿易辦事處負責促進加拿大對台出口，與吸引台灣投資人前往加國市場投資。貿易投資部份涵蓋以下主要領域：農漁業、生化科技、環保、營建、交通、資訊科技與電信
info.en: The Canadian Trade Office in Taipei (CTOT) launched the Canadian Technology Accelerator (CTA) in Taiwan in December 2018. The initiative aims to make both Canada and Taiwan’s start-up and innovation ecosystems more successful. The CTA in Taipei is part of Canada's economic diversification strategy towards Asia and it reinforces Canada’s Indo-Pacific Strategy. Initial sectors of focus include artificial intelligence (AI), Internet-of-Things (IoT), digital health and medical technology areas.

org.tc: BioAro Inc.

info.tc: BioAro Inc. 是一家總部位於卡加利的加拿大生技公司，開發精準醫療工具和護理點診斷設備、長壽和個人化醫療，以改善醫療保健服務。
info.en:
BioAro Inc. is a Calgary based Canadian biotechnology company developing Precision Medicine tools and Point-of-Care diagnostic devices Longevity and personalized medicine to  improve healthcare delivery. An ISO (9001, 15189 and 13485) certified company, BioAro specializes in using AI/ML and Quantum computing (QC) tools for development of proprietary Genomics analysis platform (PanOmiQ), a state-of-the art Bio-EMR system & a SportsGenomics program. The BioAro labs provide clinical Genomic (WGS, WES), & Microbiome sequencing services to B2B companies, hospitals, physicians, researchers & consumers, including extensive support for pharmacogenomics and rare diseases.
BioAro is working towards integration of GenOMIC, sensor/wearable and EMR data for longevity, disease management and risk assessment.

org.tc: 聖納普醫療

info.tc: 創立於2012年，加拿大醫療科技新創公司—聖納普醫療（Synaptive Medical；以下簡稱「Synaptive」）在神經外科和醫療影像創新領域樹立了新標準。秉持提升患者治療效果的使命，Synaptive 開發了一套先進的綜合工具，旨在革命性地改善從術前規劃、手術導航、手術機器人、手術模擬到磁共振成像（MRI）設備等多項技術，從而徹底改變手術體驗。自成立以來，Synaptive 已成功商業化七款產品。
info.en: Founded in 2012 , Canadian biotech  medtech startup Synaptive Medical has set a new standard for neurosurgical and medical imaging innovations. Driven by a mission to enhance patient outcomes, Synaptive has developed an integrated suite of advanced tools designed to revolutionize the surgical experience to execution in such technologies as pre-operative planning, surgical navigation, surgical robotics, surgical simulation and magnetic resonance imaging (MRI) devices. Synaptive has commercialized 7 products since inception.

info.en:
levina healthcare, a health and wellness brand from Taiwan, has launched a series of wireless electrical stimulation products designed to cater to various health needs:
RS-18 Wireless TENS/EMS: Precise pain management, fast recovery, and performance enhancement
RS-28 MotionWave: Targeting on arthritis, joint pain, and improves joint flexibility
RS-38 Menstrual Pain Relief: Lower abdominal and lower back pain caused by menstruation
RS-48 Pelvic Floor Rehab: Pelvic floor muscles strengthening,  incontinence prevention, toning aids

org.tc: Bryant Dental

info.tc: Bryant Dental的存在是因為我們知道優秀的臨床醫師能改變生命。我們的使命是為這些醫師提供如此輕便、直觀且仿生的放大鏡和頭燈，讓它們如同魔法一般，為每一位使用者開啟一系列新的可能性。作為一個由牙醫創立、為牙醫服務的公司，我們在過去的八年裡，已經在43個國家解決了臨床問題，我們迫不及待地想把世界上最舒適的人體工學放大鏡（我們突破性的Refractives）和新一代的頭燈帶給台灣充滿熱情和才華的醫師。請來看看Refractives如何改變您的牙科工作並保護您的頸椎。
info.en: Bryant Dental exists because we know great clinicians change lives. Our mission is to bring these clinicians loupes and headlights so lightweight, so intuitive, and so biomimetic that they feel like magic and unlock a new constellation of possibilities for every dentist who uses them. As a company founded by dentists, for dentists, we’ve been solving clinical problems for eight years across 43 countries, and we can’t wait to bring the world’s most comfortable ergo-loupes (our paradigm-shifting Refractives) and next-generation headlights to passionate, talented dentists in Taiwan. Visit us to see how Refractives can transform your dentistry and save your neck.

org.tc: 數碼牛教育科技股份有限公司

info.tc:
數碼牛針對醫護教育設計Med Smart Learning Hub平台(MSLH)，在MSLH中學生可提升臨床認知，並達到重複練習的目的。醫護學生通常要到實習時，才會看到病患，MSLH提供老師將過去經驗呈現在學生眼前，學生可透過MSLH平台吸收各老師的照護或治療經驗，讓往後的職業過程，非從零開始，促進臨床適應能力。另外臨床中醫院異常事件標準處理流程難以教導學生，老師可配合MSLH教育，讓學員更可以身歷其境難以碰到的案例。MSLH是醫療教育創新教學的平台，提供學校、老師、學生更好的接軌臨床教育。
MSLH同時提供三大服務：1.臨床互動式影片課程學習、2.教材系統，可與互動式影片課程相關聯，增進學習效果與臨床經驗傳承。3.數位化國考系統，讓學生適應數位化國考節奏，並且老師可自行出題，可結合教材或互動式影片，讓學生在寫國考題有臨床畫面可連貫學理相關知識。
info.en: DigiBull has designed the Med Smart Learning Hub (MSLH) platform specifically for healthcare education. Through MSLH, students can enhance their clinical understanding and achieve repetitive practice goals. Teaching standard procedures for handling abnormal events in clinical settings can be challenging, but with MSLH, educators can use the platform to provide students with immersive experiences of cases that are difficult to encounter in real life. MSLH is an innovative platform for medical education, offering schools, teachers, and students a better way to connect with clinical training.

info.en:
Our Company Will Exhibit LNP (Lipid Nanoparticle) Synthesis System
We will showcase the ultra-high resolution microscope Oxford NanoImager Oni, as well as the Single Cell Digest System and the Fully Automated Dispensing System. These latest devices offer the best tools for analysis and quality control in industries such as biopharmaceuticals, cell therapy, exosome-related fields, and more.

org.tc: 史塔克運動行銷有限公司

info.tc: 優視體利用Ai人工智能技術，僅需30秒即可完成體態評估，快速準確標記並計算骨關節位置和變異角度，如頭前傾、駝背、骨盆旋轉等，並推算出身體肌筋膜張力，並且針對檢測結果自動生成四週回家功課，提供有效解決方案。
info.en: Moti physio AI artificial intelligence technology to complete posture assessment in just 30 seconds, quickly and accurately mark and calculate bone joint positions and variation angles, such as forward head tilt, hunching, pelvic rotation, etc., and calculate the body's myofascial tension. , and automatically generate four weeks of home homework based on the test results, providing effective solutions.

org.tc: 長寅科技股份有限公司

info.tc:
醫療器材領域中，誠信正直當責專業的合作夥伴

我們的使命是提供您所需的專業知識和測試解決方案，以驗證設計、滿足監管標準、確保可靠性能以及按時、按預算將您的產品推向市場。

長寅科技(MedServ)成立於2016 年，服務範圍涵蓋國際醫療器材研發、製造、檢測及法規認證，完成產品生命週期一站式的整合．協助國內外醫療產業的製造(ISO 13485)與上市許可證申請，並與醫學中心、財團法人機構及學術等單位相互交流，提供物性、包裝材、滅菌、生物相容性、化性、電磁相容性、安規及環境可靠度等專業服務能力，開啟智慧化醫療廠嶄新的氣象。除此之外，公司持續推動醫療製造廠生產技術輔導，產出綠色醫材並配合醫療機構落實低碳醫療，制定智慧化減碳策略，達到醫療產業上下游永續發展淨零排放的目標。
info.en:
In the field of medical devices, a trustworthy, responsible, and professional partner

Our mission is to provide you with the expertise and testing solutions you need to verify designs, meet regulatory standards, ensure reliable performance, and bring your products to market on time and on within budget.

MedServ was established in 2016, with a service scope covering international medical device research and development, manufacturing, testing, and regulatory certification, offering integrated one-stop solutions for the entire product lifecycle. We assist both domestic and international medical industries in manufacturing (ISO 13485) and applying for market permits. We engage in mutual exchanges with medical centers, incorporated foundations, academic institutions, and other units, providing professional services in physical properties, packaging materials, sterilization, biocompatibility, chemical properties, electromagnetic compatibility, safety regulations, and environmental reliability, pioneering a new era of intelligent medical manufacturing. In addition, we continue to promote technical guidance for medical manufacturing producing eco-friendly medical materials, and collaborating with medical institutions to implement low-carbon medical care. We formulate smart decarbonization strategies to achieve the goal of net-zero emissions for the sustainable development in the upstream and downstream of the medical industry.

org.tc: 泰坦分子生醫股份有限公司

info.tc: 泰坦分子生醫(Biotaitan Molmed Co., Ltd., BioTMC)為設計開發服務公司，主要開發快速分子診斷平台與多標的檢測試劑套組。艾索盒子(AcesoBox)為定點照護檢測平台，操作簡便，機台精巧，更具備多標的、快速、高靈敏、精準之檢測效能，可達隨攜隨測，讓疾病無所遁形，醫療更睿智。檢測項目包含感染性疾病、性傳染病、敗血病與癌症等，應用領域廣。特別是可即時監控，獲取大量數據，進一步結合人工智慧演算，對藥物開發、藥效即時監控與用藥預測是一大利器。
info.en: Biotaitan Molmed Co., Ltd. (BioTMC) is a design house that mainly develops rapid molecular diagnostic platforms and multiplexing assay reagent sets. BioTMC has launched a point-of-care testing platform named AcesoBox, it is portable instrument and easy to operate. AcesoBox is a fast, highly sensitive, accurate and multiplexing molecular diagnostic platform, it can be hand carried and tested at anytime and anywhere, so that diseases can be correctly diagnosed, and medical treatment can be more wisdom. AcesoBox can be used in many fields, including infectious diseases, sexually transmitted diseases, sepsis and cancer, etc. It can also assay in real time, obtain a large amount of data, and further combine it with artificial intelligence calculations, which is a powerful tool for drug development, real-time monitoring of drug efficacy, and medication prediction.

org.tc: 艾普森生醫股份有限公司

info.tc: 艾普森生醫專注於DNA甲基化的檢測服務，研發團隊有20多年的甲基化研究經驗，建立的核心技術，包括: 全基因體甲基化分析平台、AI大數據分析、肝癌基因甲基化資料庫、液態檢體前處理、定量/定性甲基化分析、檢測試劑/套組開發等。提供的產品及服務有甲基化試劑套組以及甲基化檢測服務；甲基化試劑套組包含游離DNA萃取、亞硫酸鹽轉化、癌症基因qMSP試劑套組等。檢測服務涵蓋功能醫學、預防醫學以及精準醫學3大領域。功能醫學檢測有免疫力評估檢測、全身DNA甲基化檢測、抑癌基因甲基化檢測、外泌體功能分析等；在預防醫學方面有MPM肝癌早期篩檢、LiverMeth肝癌基因甲基化檢測、CancerMeth泛癌種甲基化檢測等；在精準醫學方面則有LiverRP手術切除預後、LiverAM消融術後監控、以及免疫治療/細胞治療伴隨式診斷。公司聚焦在癌症的早期診斷、疾病預後、治療評估、復發監控等各種階段的精準醫療臨床應用，幫助一般大眾或亞健康人以及癌症患者能及早發現並採取適當的個人化醫療，提高生活品質。
info.en: EpiSante Biomed focuses on DNA methylation testing services. Our R&D team has over 20 years of experience in methylation research and has established core technologies, including a whole-genome methylation analysis platform, AI big data analysis, a liver cancer gene methylation database, liquid biopsy sample preprocessing, quantitative/qualitative methylation analysis, and the development of testing reagents/kits. Our products and services include methylation reagent kits, such as cell-free DNA extraction, bisulfite conversion, and cancer gene qMSP kits. We offer methylation testing services covering three major areas: functional medicine, preventive medicine, and precision medicine. Functional medicine testing includes immunity assessment testing, whole-body DNA methylation testing, tumor suppressor gene methylation testing, and exosome functional analysis. In preventive medicine, we offer MPM early liver cancer screening, LiverMeth liver cancer gene methylation testing, and CancerMeth pan-cancer methylation testing. In precision medicine, we provide LiverRP postoperative prognosis, LiverAM ablation monitoring, and companion diagnostics for immunotherapy/cell therapy. EpiSante Biomed focuses on the clinical applications of precision medicine at various stages, including early cancer diagnosis, disease prognosis, treatment evaluation, and recurrence monitoring. Our goal is to help the general public, sub-healthy individuals, and cancer patients detect issues early and take appropriate personalized medical actions, thereby improving quality of life.

org.tc: 凌陽科技股份有限公司

info.tc:
AttoSense FET Biosensor生物晶片檢測平台
凌陽科技是一間專攻車用影音系統單晶片與矽智財設計的IC設計公司，在2019開始投入生物晶片的開發，並成功開發AttoSense FET Biosensor生物晶片檢測平台，透過在晶片檢測區連接抗體或DNA探針，以電化學感測，無須二抗成色，能夠檢測DNA、RNA、蛋白及微生物。本平台具有三大優勢：
快速：30分鐘內完成檢測，檢測過程無須培養及擴增
高靈敏度：
•	核酸的檢測最低濃度：10 -15 M; CT值：34-37
•	蛋白的檢測最低濃度：10 -18 g/mL
泛用性：樣品類型包括：全血、口腔液、糞便及拭子。

《產品及服務》
AttoSense生物晶片
•	AttoSense生物晶片-PEDV 
•	AttoSense生物晶片-ASFV（開發中）
•	AttoSense生物晶片-AI（開發中）
客製化生物晶片服務
•	客戶提供抗體或是DNA探針，由凌陽委託開發
AttoSense生物晶片讀取設備
•	手持式檢測儀：提供現場快速檢測的解決方案，配合藍芽連接手機，直接讀取資料並上傳雲端。
•	自動化機台：適用於定點檢測，且無須專業人員操作。
info.en:
AttoSense FET Biosensor platform
Sunplus Technology Co., Ltd is a fabless IC and IP Design Company specializes in automotive IC. In 2019, Sunplus start development of biochips and successfully developed AttoSense FET Biosensor platform. This platform detects DNA, RNA, proteins, and microorganisms through electrochemical sensing by connecting antibodies or DNA probes in the detection area of biochip. This platform has three main advantages:
Rapid: Detection is completed within 30 minutes without culture or amplification.
High Sensitivity:
•	The minimum detection concentration for DNA/RNA: 10 -15 M; CT value: 34-37.
•	The minimum detection concentration for proteins: 10 -18 g/mL.
High Flexibility: Can handle whole blood, oral fluid, feces and swab sample.
Products and Services
AttoSense Chip
•	AttoSense Chip-PEDV
•	AttoSense Chip-ASFV (developing)
•	AttoSense Chip-AI (developing) 
Customization AttoSense Chip Services
•	Clients provide antibodies or DNA probes for development commissioned by Sunplus. 
AttoSense Biochip Reading Devices:
•	Hand held portable reader: This solution provides rapid on-site testing, integrated with Bluetooth connectivity to mobile phones, enabling direct data reading and cloud uploading
•	Automated analyzer: Suitable for fixed-point testing and do not require professional operation.

info.tc:
源星是將AI置入醫療器材的研發公司。源星生醫創辦目的是提前預警心肌梗塞及中風的發生，使用AI智慧來解決全球最大死因的心血管問題。
源星生醫研發出全球最先進的心臟疾病演算法「人工智能預警心臟病技術」，該技術2020年獲得美國百大科技獎 (R&D 100 Awards)IT/電氣類第一位，可偵測急性心率不整及心房顫動，並在美國及台灣擁有專利，並在台灣教學醫院經過臨床測試，偵測心房顫動(AF)之靈敏度為96.68%，特異度90.53%，準確度93.76%。OSTAR血氧機採用此AI技術，能提供快速又準確的心臟數據，可進行血氧、心臟跳動及波形量測。
「雲端多功能病人監視器」獲衛福部·經濟部頒發「藥物科技研究發展獎」－醫療器材類金質獎，本獎為台灣唯一由中央主管機關(衛福部、經濟部)共同主辦，為國家級獎項之榮譽。
「心臟頻譜血壓計」獲衛福部·經濟部頒發「藥物科技研究發展獎」－醫療器材類銅質獎。採用OSTAR 自行研發出全球最先進的AI心臟疾病演算法，並有AI智能校正功能，無需回廠校正。

org.tc: 通用幹細胞股份有限公司

info.tc:
通用幹細胞公司專注於提供高效化、標準化與普及化的細胞服務與其培養平台，公司由㇐群具有創新熱忱及專業團隊組成。從尖端基礎研究到醫療器材生產販售，提供細胞培養相關服務，以及基於臨床實證基礎之細胞治療產品。

PCP (Peripheral blood Cell Purification) 血液細胞純化技術，為通用幹細胞開發之獨家專利技術。藉由濃縮純化自體周邊血液單核細胞，並藉由其可成為具有抗發炎與組織修復功能的M2 巨噬細胞，達到細胞治療的效果。PCP 單核細胞療法經研究證實具有⾧期抑制發炎和分泌二型膠原蛋白的作用，在退化性關節炎等臨床試驗中證實可舒緩患者疼痛及恢復運動功能，效果達兩年以上。
info.en: Peripheral Blood Cell Purification (PCP) technology is an exclusive patented technique developed by DuoGenic StemCells corporation. It concentrates and purifies mononuclear cells from autologous peripheral blood, which can differentiate into M2 macrophages with anti-inflammatory and tissue repair functions, achieving cellular therapeutic effects. PCP therapy has been proven by research to have the effect of initially inhibiting inflammation and secreting type II collagen. Clinical trials in conditions such as osteoarthritis have shown relief of patient pain and restoration of mobility, with effects lasting for over two years.

info.tc: 全球協作型機器人領導品牌Universal Robots致力於提供可靠易用的自動化工具，協助企業跨越自動化鴻溝，長遠發展優異的生產工藝，領先應對產業的各項挑戰。負重範圍3-35公斤、精度0.03-0.10 mm的UR機器人幾乎能將一切自動化，舉凡包裝堆棧/鎖附螺絲/品檢/焊接等都是常見應用。 產品以彈性安全、編程簡易廣泛獲得業界採用。體型輕巧、安裝方式多元的特性可供用戶輕鬆部署於現有產線。廣納機械手臂周邊配件的UR+生態系統，提供用戶各種應用所需的末端夾治具，隨插即用的方便性讓用戶享受完整自動化方案的最大優勢，實現人機協作願景。
info.en: Universal Robots is a global leader in collaborative robotics (cobots), used across a wide range of industries. Our mission is simple: Automation for anyone. Anywhere. With over 90,000 cobots sold worldwide, our user-friendly platform is supported by the intuitive PolyScope software, award-winning training, comprehensive services, and the world’s largest cobot ecosystem, delivering innovation and choice to our customers. Universal Robots is part of Teradyne Robotics, a division of Teradyne (NASDAQ:TER), a leading supplier of automatic test equipment and advanced robotics technology.

info.tc:
久億生醫科技專注於提供醫療及生技產業所需的高品質產品，致力於確保使用者的安全與健康。我們代理多項全球知名品牌，包括英國AMITY 的器械清潔消毒產品、德國GKE 的滅菌監測產品，以及 德國MELAG 的滅菌設備等等，為市場提供全方位的感染控制解決方案。
1.	AMITY 器械清潔消毒產品：AMITY 以其卓越的清潔消毒技術聞名，其產品廣泛應用於醫療器械的清潔與表面消毒，確保操作環境和器械的無菌狀態。這些產品不僅具有效的殺菌效果，還對環境友善，符合國際標準，適用於各種醫療和實驗室環境。
2.	GKE 滅菌監測產品：我們提供 GKE 的滅菌監測解決方案，這些產品能夠精確監控和驗證滅菌過程的效果。無論是在醫院、診所還是實驗室，GKE 的產品都能確保滅菌程序的可靠性與安全性，大幅降低感染風險，提升病患及使用者的健康保障。
3.	MELAG 滅菌鍋：MELAG 是全球領先的滅菌設備製造商，其滅菌鍋以高效能、穩定性和操作便捷性著稱。這些設備採用最新技術，能夠快速而徹底地滅菌，確保每一次滅菌過程的安全性與一致性，適用於醫療機構及各類實驗室需求。
