org.tc: 安鑫生物科技股份有限公司

info.tc: 安鑫生技即將展出一系列高品質、高活性的產品，致力於推動生物科技醫療領域的進步和創新。我們的展品包括：GMP重組蛋白，適用於各種細胞療法，具備優異的生物活性和價格競爭力；提供高純度、高品質的IVT mRNA體外合成材料，以及多種mRNA產品，如螢光標記的可用作核酸遞送的陽性指標，也有多種品項可用於基因編輯研究。此外，我們還提供市場獨有規格的RNA Ladder，專為self amplifying mRNA的研究人員提供更方便的工具，同時提供過敏原材料，包括抗過敏IgE抗體及抗原等。
info.en: Croyez will showcase a series of high-quality, high-activity products, dedicated to advancing innovation in the biotech medical field. Our exhibits include: GMP recombinant proteins, suitable for various cell therapy applications, with outstanding biological activity and competitive pricing; providing high-purity, high-quality IVT mRNA synthesis materials, and a variety of mRNA products, such as fluorescent-labeled ones that can serve as positive indicators for nucleic acid delivery, and various items for gene editing research. Additionally, we offer market-exclusive specifications of RNA Ladder, providing a more convenient tool for researchers focusing on self-amplifying mRNA, while also providing allergen materials, including antigen and anti-allergy IgE antibodies.

org.tc: EB
有勁基因股份有限公司
org.en: Yourgene Health (Taiwan) in partnership with INEX Innovate (Singapore)

info.tc:
有勁基因股份有限公司(Yourgene Health (Taiwan) Co., Ltd.)在次世代定序技術領域已有超過13年以上的經驗，在亞太地區提供包含非侵入產前染色體檢測、科學研究、空間轉錄體研究、臨床研究與客製化生物資訊分析委託等服務，有勁基因體核心實驗室在非侵入產前染色體檢測上，已獲得LDTS列冊及ISO/IEC 17025:2017認證，服務品質具專業級水準，深受國內外許多客戶信賴。 

有勁基因主要的產品及服務如下: 
• 非侵入性產前染色體檢測(包含委託檢測與技術轉移服務): Sage™ prenatal screen and the IONA® Nx test 
• 腫瘤生物資訊三級分析: Molecular Health 
• 臨床研究: 固態或液態腫瘤學研究 
• 生殖醫學檢測 
• 檢測方法專案合作開發
info.en:
With more than 13 years of Next Generation Sequencing (NGS) experiences, Yourgene Health (Taiwan) Co., Ltd offers reliable services including NIPT (Non-Invasive Prenatal Testing), tumor profiling, clinical research services and bioinformatic solutions to customers in APAC region. Yourgene Taipei service laboratory has acquired ISO/IEC 17025:2017 accreditation and Taiwan LDTS listing for NIPT (Non-Invasive Prenatal Testing) services. 

Yourgene Health (Taiwan) Co., Ltd works in partnership with global leaders in DNA technology on:  
• Leading NIPT solutions for labs and clinicians: Sage™ prenatal screen and the IONA® Nx test 
• NGS research services: Spatial transcriptomics, whole genome sequencing, whole exome sequencing and metagenomic sequencing  
• Clinical oncology research  
• Oncology tertiary analysis: Molecular Health 
• Reproductive health

org.tc: 威健股份有限公司

info.tc:
威健股份有限公司是一家專注於生命科學領域的儀器試劑及服務供應商。公司推出了多項創新的臨床產品，包括
非侵入性染色體檢測（NIPT）是一種利用母體血液中胎兒游離DNA來進行染色體異常篩檢的技術。與傳統的羊水穿刺或絨毛膜採樣相比，NIPT具有無創、準確、安全等優點。
全方位染色體基因晶片（array CGH）是一種利用染色體基因晶片技術來分析染色體異常的技術。該技術可以檢測出傳統染色體檢測無法發現的微小染色體異常，包括染色體數目異常、染色體結構異常等。
全外顯子分析（Exome Sequencing）是一種利用高通量測序技術來分析人類全外顯子組的技術。全外顯子組包含了人類所有編碼基因的編碼區域，為遺傳性疾病、生育健康的臨床醫師提供準確的參考依據。
威健的產品及服務均符合標準，並獲得了多項認證，包括TAF TFDA/LDTS等。公司致力於為客戶提供高品質的臨床產品服務。
info.en: Welgene Biotech was founded in 2003. We have an independent, high-quality certified laboratory that specializes in gene chip and next-generation sequencing analysis, among other gene test technologies. It also has a bioinformatics department that provides big data analysis and data computation to integrate information from all services, comprehensively improving the quality of testing services. Our gene test services have been separately certified by TAF, TFDA, and the original manufacturer. Our strategy is to transform high-throughput gene test platforms into clinical applications, offering array comparative genomic hybridization for prenatal amniotic fluid test, preimplantation genetic test for aneuploidy, EndoPredict® breast cancer prognostic test, whole-exome sequencing, and non-invasive prenatal test.

info.tc:
「神助物流設備」的無軌移動櫃系統提供了有效的儲存解決方案，憑藉專利技術有效解決了傳統儲存設備面臨的空間、安全及衛生挑戰。

安全性是醫療行業的首要考量，我們的無軌移動櫃系統消除了脫軌的風險，確保藥品、敏感器械及重要醫療用品的安全存放，其結構設計考慮到操作人員的安全，降低了在儲存過程中的事故風險。

我們的無軌設計易於清潔，有效減少灰塵和微粒的積聚，醫療環境中的空間管理至關重要。我們的系統靈活的空間配置，優化垂直和水平儲存空間，適用於空間有限的場地。

模組化設計則提供了高度的定制性，使我們的產品能夠針對各種醫療環境進行特定調整，無論是藥品、試劑、醫療檔案或其他關鍵物料的存儲，都能提供最適合的解決方案。

「神助物流設備」在醫療行業的應用，不僅提高了存儲效率和操作安全性，還為醫療專業人員創造了一個更加整潔、高效的工作環境，從而促進了整體醫療服務的質量和效率。
info.en: GODSPEED Logistics Equipment's trackless mobile shelving system provides an effective storage solution, leveraging patented technology to effectively address the challenges of space, safety, and hygiene that traditional storage equipment faces. Its application in the medical industry not only improves storage efficiency and operational safety but also creates a more orderly and efficient work environment for medical professionals. This, in turn, enhances the overall quality and efficiency of medical services.

org.tc: 台灣派特萊股份有限公司

info.tc:
PATLITE成立於1947年，是以多元性、高科技先進製造聞名的國際化企業。
在全球擁有超過1000名員工，不僅是日本總公司，同時在台灣、北美、新加坡、中國、歐洲、英國、韓國、泰國以及墨⻄哥等國家都有全資子公司，全球公認的警示設備第一品牌。

PATLITE的光學、聲學以及電子工程師具備數十年的創新開發相關經驗。
敝司也會持續擴展警示產品品項及服務，以滿足工業、商業、政府、民間等不同需求為己任。
致力將PATLITE警示產品廣泛用於改善現場的品質管理、生產管理以及最重要的安全管理。聽見顧客需求，提供最完善的整體解決方案，是PATLITE能為您做到的。
info.en:
Since 1947, PATLITE has offered state-of-the-art equipment for the process and industrial automation industries. Innovative and durable design, backed by years of industry experience and a strong commitment to safety and security, has made PATLITE the world's best known manufacturer of visual and audible signaling devices. Headquartered in Japan, PATLITE has more than 1000 employees worldwide with wholly-owned sales subsidiaries in the USA, Mexico, Germany, UK, Singapore, Korea, Thailand, Taiwan, and China.

Beginning with the invention of a single micromotor, PATLITE has been expanding its technology and product line while focusing on industry trends and innovation. As the industry’s signaling needs shift from simple lights and buzzers to smart, network-capable devices, PATLITE has provided an array of products ranging from wireless data-acquisition systems, programmable signal towers, IO-Link and POE-enabled devices, and more. With constant efforts to meet and exceed customers’ expectations for reliable products, PATLITE continues to deliver safety, security and comfort to workplaces and facilities throughout the world.

info.tc: 和鑫生技一直以來致力於單能光研發、生產及製造，運用Nanoray單能光技術優勢，有效降低醫學成像的輻射劑量，透過更小的功率需求及更大的拍攝角度，提供人們尤其是兒童更安全、快速及經濟的成像選擇。Revolux是Nanoray以其獨特的穿透式X光射源， 成功的整合了台灣的數位影像偵測板、成像軟體及機構，完成了國內自製全球唯一的低輻射手部X光機。外觀設計輕巧，擁有安全防護設計，讓使用者在更安全、友好的情境下進行手部影像拍攝。Revolux已正式通過美國及台灣FDA認証，除了針對兒童骨齡成長曲線的診斷外，亦可針對老人、婦女的骨質密度檢測、類風濕性關節疾病早期診斷及手部矯正重建手術之應用。
info.en: NanoRay Biotech Co. has been devoted to research and developments of patented transmission X-ray technology. By generating a monochromatic spectrum with a specific niche of beam energy contributing to higher image contract, lower energy consumption and decreased absorbing dosage for patients, the transmission X-ray tube is able to provide a much safer, faster and more affordable choice in medical imaging, especially in pediatric field. As the world’s first “Made- in- Taiwan” low energy hand X-ray device, Revolux is comprised of the unique transmission X-Ray tube, digital image sensor, imaging software system and a radiation contained housing. Furthermore, Revolux revels not only an elegant appearance but also a high-level safety and protective design which is intended to provide a high-quality environment for patients taking the image. Revolux has been officially approved by USFDA and TFDA. For future application, NanoRay Biotech Co. aims to provide a better healthcare service in the medical needs of children’s bone age diagnosis, bone density detection for both the elderly men and women, early diagnosis for rheumatoid arthritis, as well as hand bone reconstructive surgery.

info.tc: 億宣應用科技股份有限公司成立於2020年，擁有堅強的5G行動通訊網路技術團隊、其團隊透過5G專網的佈建，以無線行動通訊技術訊號結合物聯網、5G 垂直整合應用、雲端管理平台及大數據資料採集，建立各項應用。透過5G【高頻寬、低延遲、廣連結】特性，將病患的生理數據、高清檢測影像，即時傳輸至看診醫師進行診斷，能讓醫生、病患進行病情有效溝通。例如病患、資產定位跟蹤、生理量測資訊、行動護理車、院區導航、互動引導機器人等，達到醫院智慧聯網、資訊安全共享、藉以推動醫院數位化轉型。5G網路雖然具備高等級的安全防護，針對醫院自建5G專網，我們提供一套完整的5G專頻專網資安解決方案，以提供多層防護：網路防護、終端裝置防護、多點監控、事先預防。
info.en:
Vertex was established in 2020. It has a strong 5G mobile communication network technology team. It uses wireless mobile communication technology signals combined with the Internet of Things, 5G vertically integrated applications, cloud management platforms and big data data collection to create various applications.
Through the characteristics of 5G [Enhanced Mobile Broadband, Urtla Reliable Low-latency Communication, and Massive Machine -Type Communication], the patient's physiological data and high-definition test images are instantly transmitted to the doctor for diagnosis, allowing doctors and patients to communicate effectively about their condition.
For example, patient and asset location tracking, physiological measurement information, mobile nursing vehicles, hospital area navigation, interactive guidance robots, etc. can achieve smart networking and secure information sharing in hospitals, thereby promoting the digital transformation of hospitals.
Although 5G networks have high-level security protection, for hospitals’ self-built 5G private networks, we provide a complete set of 5G dedicated frequency private network security solutions to provide at least multiple layers of protection: network protection, terminal device protection, Multi-point monitoring and prevention in advance.

org.tc: 確時股份有限公司

info.tc:
確時股份有限公司 (Accue Co., Ltd) 成立於 1974.  Accue 是我們的牌子.

確時股份有限公司是一家技術型公司, 專門做準確的同步鐘給醫院用, 統一全醫院的時間, 以應付醫療事故的時間紀錄用.

我們主要做掛牆的同步鐘 (子母鐘). 我們是透過 WiFi 跟原子鐘對時 (不需要拉線). 原子鐘可以是網上的, 或者是自己的 time server.

我們有指針 (28 ~ 60 cm 直徑) 和數字式的 (46 x 32 cm). 
數字式的還用了光能, 便再也不用換電池了, 使得一輩子都不用照顧它.

因為 Accue 的 WiFi 鐘有自動調節夏令時間的功能, 有夏令時間的國家, 便不用每年都要兩次的, 要在一個晚上調整幾百個鐘!

FYR.  香港很多的政府醫院都用了我們的鐘.

因為準確, 所以醫患都可以相信你的鐘, 加上不用照顧, 所以醫院的 accreditation 能加分.
info.en:
Accue Co., Ltd was established in 2014.  Accue is our brand name.

It is an engineering based company located in HK, aiming at providing good time stamp for hospitals, in case medical issues happen!
 
Our main products are synchronized wall clock series (master clock system).  We synchronize all the clocks to the atomic clocks through WiFi automatically.  (No wiring is needed.)  The atomic clocks can be the time servers on the internet, or your own time server.  It has auto DST feature.

We have analog and digital versions.  
The analog ones are 28 ~ 60 cm dia.  And the digital one is 46 x 32 cm. 
The digital version even uses light energy in the office.  So no need to change battery, totally carefree!

Since it has auto DST (Daylight Saving Time) feature, so you do not need to adjust hundreds of clocks in one night for countries having DST, twice per year!

FYR.  The government hospitals in Hong Kong are using our WiFi clocks happily!

People can trust the clock you put in the wards.  So its accuracy and carefree do help accreditation of your hospital.

org.tc: 艾爾智能科技股份有限公司

info.tc:
Flores智慧裝置，下一代氣喘照護科技
隨著現代都市環境的發展，氣喘已逐漸成為當代文明病之一。依據國健署調查，台灣成人氣喘盛行率約為10%，且逐年攀升，意即每十人就有一人可能飽受氣喘之苦。然而，普遍氣喘病患仍未對氣喘是慢性疾病有正確認知，且藥物遵醫囑率低持續是臨床上妥善控制氣喘的一大障礙。
隨著IoT技術的發展，Flores智慧裝置能搭載於主流的氣喘用藥，持續量測病患日常生活中的每一次用藥行為。藉由BLE通訊配合個人化行動應用程式，智慧服務持續掌握病患的用藥狀態並提醒用藥，能有效提升病患使用藥物的遵從度。與其他技術應用不同，Flores的專利流量測技術，不僅能掌握用藥次數，更能深入探索每次用藥吸氣時的品質參數，例如各次用藥時吸氣的時間長度、尖峰流速、總吸氣量及波形模式。
Flores智慧裝置，不僅突破了氣喘用藥遵醫囑率量測及強化的障礙，其累積及即時的感測技術載體，更將是氣喘照護邁向個人化智慧化醫療的關鍵基石。
info.en:
Flores Smart Inhaler - The Next Generation of Asthma Care AIoT
Asthma is a growing chronic disease in most developed countries, with an average prevalence rate of around 10%. However, medication compliance is commonly noted as a major barrier to effective asthma control.
With the advent of IoT technology, the Flores Smart Inhaler is an add-on device that can be attached to major asthma medications. By integrating with a mobile application via BLE communication, the personalized assistant manages and reminds patients about proper medicine use. Unlike typical prior applications, the patented flow detection technology not only captures drug usage activity but also details the quality attributes of each inhalation, such as duration, peak flow, volume capacity, and flow pattern.
The Flores Smart Inhaler is an effective solution to mitigate the compliance barrier of asthma medication. Beyond this breakthrough, the data associated with this novel sensor platform further enables a more personalized and smarter asthma care ecosystem.

info.tc:
Genomics原意為基因體學，本公司以此 Genomics(基龍米克斯) 為名，期望藉由基因資訊的運用與開發，解決許多與人類日常生活息息相關的問題。基龍米克斯生物科技股份有限公司成立於2001年，由師承兩次諾貝爾獎得主Fred Sanger的中研院基因定序專家周德源博士及其技術團隊所創，為台灣最大的商業基因體公司。

基龍米克斯集結各式基因體分析平台，全力開發基因體定序於科技服務及臨床醫學市場，從基因層面的序列分析一直到基因表現後所造成的個體化差異，提供研究人員及醫療機構全方位的技術服務。持續更新的平台技術及生物資訊分析能力，基龍米克斯無論在基礎研究或臨床檢測上，都是最強而有力的夥伴。公司立足台灣，佈局全亞洲，引進國際最先進的基因定序儀器，引領亞洲基因定序及檢測!
info.en:
We use “Genomics” as the company name in hope to use genomic information to solve various problems related to our daily lives. Genomics was founded in 2001 by Dr. T.Y. Chow, a student of Dr. Frederick Sanger who was twice the recipient of the Nobel Prize for Chemistry. As the project leader of Academia Sinica Plant Genome Center, ASPGC, Dr. Chow represented Taiwan and led his team to participate in the International Rice Genome Sequencing Project (IRGSP), becoming the first to complete the sequence of rice chromosome 5. 

Genomics is devoted to the development of basic research and application of genomics, and become the largest commercial genome sequencing company in Taiwan. We establish a genomic research platform and provide professional technological services. Based on existing technology services, we develop genetic testing for fetus and pregnant woman to get smooth production and more health in life. No matter what you do with genomics in research and medical, Genomics is the strongest partner! Just Contact with us!

info.tc:
惠家體外反搏治療系統是All-in-One，通過採集患者的心電信號，進行R波即時檢測，並由R波觸發控制氣囊充、排氣的動作。充氣是按照從患者的小腿、大腿到臀部、上臂進行三級序貫加壓，使上、下肢血液在心臟舒張期間驅回灌注於上半身，並通過靜脈返回心臟，從而促進心、腦等器官的血液循環，以改善缺血組織的血液供應。2.增肌減脂鑽石儀：以高強度的電磁場，刺激運動神經元，使肌肉進行2萬次以上的收縮，達到強化肌肉的目的。非入式的體雕療程，不需要麻醉或穿刺，快速達成體態美化。僅須透過探頭鎖定目標肌肉，達到被動式的訓練。體外反搏是採用電腦系統控制包裹住患者小腿、大腿、臀部和手臂的加壓帶充、放氣。加壓帶於心臟舒張初期，按照從末梢至近端的三級貫序充氣，並在心臟開始收縮前的舒張末期同時放氣。充氣與放氣將與患者的心電圖同步化，升高冠狀動脈的灌流壓力與靜脈回流至右心血量(增加前負荷及心輸出量)；而囊套快速且同步的排氣動作可降低全身血管阻力、後負荷及心臟工作量。透過門診治療，療程7週、每週5次，每次1小時。隨著心血管功能的改善，全身主要器官包括腦部、神經系統、腎臟、泌尿生殖系統等循環也獲得改善。高氣氧艙，廠牌：HBOT MEDICAL，有兩款型號
1. 1.5ATA （M50）艙內人數：1人;大氣壓力：1.1～1.5ATA（10-50kPa)
2. 2ATA （M200）;艙內人數：1人;大氣壓力：1.1～2.0ATA(10-100kPa)
info.en:
HJ EECP device is All-in-One. It collects the patient's ECG signal, conducts instant R-wave detection, and uses the R-wave trigger to control the inflation and deflation of the air bag. Inflation is a three-level sequential pressurization from the patient's calves, thighs to buttocks and upper arms, so that the blood of the upper and lower limbs can be driven back to the upper body during diastole and returned to the heart through the veins, thus promoting the function of the heart, brain and other organs. blood circulation to improve blood supply to ischemic tissues. 2. HIFEM device: uses high-intensity electromagnetic fields to stimulate motor neurons and cause muscles to contract more than 20,000 times to achieve the purpose of strengthening muscles. This non-invasive body sculpting treatment and can quickly achieve body beautification.EECP uses a computer system to control the inflation and deflation of compression belts wrapped around the patient's calves, thighs, buttocks and arms. The compression band is inflated in a three-level sequence from the distal end to the proximal end at the beginning of the heart's diastole, and deflated simultaneously at the end of diastole before the heart begins to contract. Inflation and deflation will be synchronized with the patient's ECG signals, increasing coronary perfusion pressure and venous return to the right heart (increasing preload and cardiac output); while the rapid and synchronous deflation of the cuff can reduce systemic vascular resistance , afterload and cardiac workload. Through outpatient treatment, the treatment course is 7 weeks, 5 times a week, 1 hour each time. As cardiovascular function improves, circulation in major organs throughout the body, including the brain, nervous system, kidneys, and genitourinary system, also improves.Brand: HBOT MEDICAL  Two models:
1.5ATA (M50)Cabin Capacity: 1 person ,Atmospheric Pressure: 1.1–1.5ATA (10-50kPa)
2ATA (M200)Cabin Capacity: 1 person,Atmospheric Pressure: 1.1–2.0ATA (10-100kPa)

VeinViewer Vision2是一款先進的液晶靜脈定位器，利用近紅外光和AVIN系統，即時將皮下靜脈結構投影至皮膚表面，再細的血管都無所遁形！支援手持或固定操作，適應各種病患姿勢與滿足不同的臨床需求，大幅提升成功率，提高醫療效率。


Visbody S30是一款專業的人體3D掃描與健康分析設備，採用BIA/IBS的結合技術，能夠快速精準產生的3D人體模型與多維健康指標。全面掌握身體健康。
Dr.Pa是一款非侵入性動脈血管程度檢測儀器，採用日本精密技術，擁有多項國際技術專利，包括90秒快速檢測，可快速測量AVI（中心動脈硬化指數）、API（周邊動脈硬化指數）、CSBP（中心動脈儀血壓值）及CAPP（中心動脈脈壓差）操作簡單，檢測準確，適用於日常健康監測及心血管風險評估，是預防動脈粥狀硬化的理想選擇，其臨床成效受到日本多所大學、研究所及醫療院所證實。目前新指標應用在臨床學術研究上已超過100篇以上，其中原創論文有36篇，皆顯示新指標的有效論證。

info.tc: Simple Protein 極簡乳清以其純淨天然及高標準品質管控而聞名。作為全國首家通過雙潔淨標章評鑑的乳清蛋白產品，Simple Protein 恪守八大不添加原則，包括不使用防腐劑、人工香料、色素及甜味劑等，確保享受香濃口感的同時無健康負擔。每年由慈悅機構核查生產流程，確保符合國家衛生標準，為消費者提供安心選擇。Simple Protein 以其簡約的成分表，僅含高品質原料，滿足運動愛好者對天然、清爽口感的追求，每份提供約21克優質蛋白質。這種專注於健康與純淨的品牌理念，使其成為天然蛋白質補充的最佳選擇。
info.en: Simple Protein is renowned for its pure, natural ingredients and high-standard quality control. As the first whey protein product in the nation to get the clean label certification, Simple Protein adheres to eight no-additive principles, including the exclusion of preservatives, artificial flavors, colors, and sweeteners. This ensures a rich taste without health risks. Each year, the production process is audited by the Tzu Yueh organization to ensure compliance with national health standards, providing consumers a safe choice. Simple Protein's minimalist ingredient list, featuring only high-quality ingredients, satisfies fitness enthusiasts' desire for a natural and refreshing taste, offering approximately 21 grams of high-quality protein per serving. This focus on health and purity makes it the best choice for natural protein supplementation.

org.tc: 向榮生醫科技股份有限公司

info.tc:
向榮生技專精於幹細胞治療的研發與應用已十餘年。本公司幹細胞新藥『ELIXCYTE®』正進行第III期膝骨關節炎收案與完成第I/II期慢性腎臟病的臨床試驗數據分析，希望為全球人口老化所伴隨之疾病，提供一個嶄新的治療契機。

在新藥研發過程中，本公司依循國際醫藥法規協和會（ICH）規範建立異體脂肪幹細胞庫，於2022年取得美國FDA主檔案(Master File, MF)備案，可作為良好的幹細胞新藥開發原料。

此外，向榮生技更擴大幹細胞科技應用，成功開發兩項專利產品：1. 幹細胞分泌物，以專利製程生產高品質、高產量及高有效成分之幹細胞分泌物，亦獲得美國FDA主檔案備案，已應用於退化性眼部疾病及其他再生醫學的應用開發，更可提供作為外泌體研究開發原料。2.細胞超低溫儲存容器『優易保® UnicoVial®』，取得衛福部第二等級醫療器材核可，獲得美國FDA主檔案備案，不僅適用於細胞產品也適用於其他生物製劑，提升製劑品質規格並彌補細胞製劑產業的缺口。

向榮生技期待以幹細胞新藥開發及幹細胞技術應用，促進幹細胞技術在全球高齡社會之再生醫學以及退化性疾病的運用，追求生命更好的生活品質。
info.en: For a decade, UnicoCell pioneered stem cell therapy R&D. UnicoCell's Gold Award-winning new stem cell product, ELIXCYTE®, has advanced to the case enrollment phase of Phase III clinical trials for knee osteoarthritis and the clinical trial data analysis for phase I/II chronic kidney disease (CKD) has been completed, promising innovative treatments for aging-related diseases. The company follows ICH guidelines, holds a 2022 US FDA Master File (MF) for an adipose-derived stem cell bank, a vital raw material for stem cell drug development. UnicoCell has innovated two patented products: 1. Stem Cell Secretome, which is FDA MF-recognized, and is applied for degenerative eye diseases, regenerative medicine, and exosome research. 2. UnicoVial® ultra-low temperature storage, obtained TFDA Class II medical device approval and FDA MF-recognized, applied for cell therapy and biological product storage. UnicoCell aspires to globalize stem cell technology, promote regenerative medicine for aging-related conditions, and ultimately enhance the quality of human life.

info.tc:
亞 洲 最 具 有 影 響 力 的 生 醫 媒 體

串連全球生醫生技領域的媒體平台

GeneOnline專注於為B2B提供全球生醫生技領域的媒體曝光，並且以深入的雙語市場洞察和專業新聞報導為核心。

我們的團隊由具有生醫生技背景的專業記者與編輯組成，這些專業人士不僅具備豐富的業界知識，還能夠提供具有深度分析和前瞻性的內容，幫助您在競爭激烈的市場中脫穎而出。

我們的使命是通過提供最新的全球生醫、生技科技及製藥趨勢情報，來幫助業界領袖掌握關鍵動向。我們的內容包括獨家專訪、行業新聞報導、技術創新以及對全球會議和活動的全方位報導，為讀者提供最新且有價值的資訊。

憑藉我們在亞太地區的強大網絡，GeneOnline不僅能夠為您提供廣泛的全球媒體曝光，還能透過我們的媒體平台、數據庫和商業合作夥伴關係，助力您的品牌和產品在國際間獲得更多關注。
info.en:
Asia's Most Influential Life Sciences Media
A Media Platform Connecting the Global Life Sciences and Biotechnology Sectors
GeneOnline specializes in providing global media exposure in the life sciences and biotechnology sectors for B2B audiences, with a focus on in-depth bilingual market insights and professional news reporting.
Our team consists of professional journalists and editors with backgrounds in life sciences and biotechnology. These experts not only possess extensive industry knowledge but also provide in-depth analysis and forward-looking content that helps you stand out in a competitive market.
Our mission is to help industry leaders stay ahead of key trends by offering the latest intelligence on global life sciences, biotechnology, and pharmaceutical developments. Our content includes exclusive interviews, industry news reports, technological innovations, and comprehensive coverage of global conferences and events, providing our audience with the most up-to-date and valuable information.
Leveraging our strong network in the Asia-Pacific region, GeneOnline not only offers extensive global media exposure but also helps boost your brand and product visibility internationally through our media platforms, databases, and business partnerships.

org.tc: 永達儀器有限公司

info.tc:
永達儀器有限公司誠摯邀請您蒞臨台灣醫療科技展，探索最前沿的醫學模擬科技，提升台灣醫療教育新高度！

本次展會我們精心挑選了三款高端醫學模擬設備，專為手術、超音波和創傷訓練而設計：
 1. 腹腔鏡模擬機 LAP Mentor：LAP Mentor 提供極為真實的腹腔鏡手術模擬環境，涵蓋多種微創手術技術。學員可以在安全、可控的環境中進行手術操作訓練，有效提升技術水平和臨床操作信心，是培養外科人才的理想選擇。
 2. 超音波模擬機 US Mentor：US Mentor 提供多樣的超音波臨床場景，包括腹部、心臟、產科等領域，適合各科醫生進行全面的超音波訓練。這款設備通過高精度模擬真實超音波影像，提升學員的診斷能力和操作技巧，滿足台灣醫學教學及臨床需求。
 3. 創傷模擬機 TraumaVR：針對急救和戰傷訓練需求，TraumaVR 提供逼真的創傷處理模擬。它可重現真實災難場景，幫助急救和醫護人員在模擬情境中進行訓練，強化應急反應能力，並適用於軍事、消防及災害應變等領域。

永達儀器有限公司自1948年成立以來，始終秉持提供頂尖醫學教育設備的宗旨，為台灣培育醫學專業人才提供助力。我們深知台灣醫學教育對精準度和真實性的要求，因此精選全球領先的模擬設備，讓教育訓練更貼近臨床實務。歡迎蒞臨我們的展位，親身體驗未來醫療教育的無限可能！
info.en:
Youngtah Instrument Co., Ltd. warmly invites you to explore the latest in medical simulation technology at the Taiwan Medical Technology Expo, setting new standards for healthcare training in Taiwan!

Our highlighted products include three state-of-the-art simulators designed for surgery, ultrasound, and trauma training:
 1. LAP Mentor Laparoscopic Simulator: The LAP Mentor provides an incredibly realistic environment for laparoscopic surgery training, covering a wide range of minimally invasive techniques. It’s ideal for building essential surgical skills in a safe and controlled setting.
 2. US Mentor Ultrasound Simulator: The US Mentor offers diverse ultrasound training scenarios, including abdominal, cardiac, and obstetrics modules, enhancing diagnostic skills with realistic imaging. It’s the perfect solution for comprehensive ultrasound education.
 3. TraumaVR Simulator: TraumaVR addresses the unique needs of trauma and emergency response training, recreating realistic disaster scenarios. Ideal for military, emergency, and disaster response teams, it builds critical emergency management skills.

Since 1948, Youngtah Instrument Co., Ltd. has dedicated itself to advancing medical education in Taiwan. Visit our booth to experience the future of medical training firsthand!

特色：
採用恆日專利---Sunray控色技術(AI Color Engine), 體驗真實的98%陽光及色彩，配合人體晝夜節律，增進睡眠品質，降低壓力與焦慮

●演色性Ra>98, 精準且滑順的無極調整1800K~20,000K色溫, 高階16-Bits/65, 536級，真實的True Color讓每種顏色都是高飽和高還原色彩，同時滿足控色的渴望與高品質太陽環境光。

●內置時鐘可依APP調整光色亮度，多種有線/無線控制可自由規畫使用模式，精準調節生理節律
info.en:
Applying Lighten's Patent --- Sunray Technology / Color-Calibration System (Ai Color Engine) to experience 98% authentic sunlight and colors, aligned with the human circadian rhythm, enhancing sleep quality and reducing stress and anxiety.

● Color rendering index Ra > 98, precise and smooth adjustment of color temperature from 1800K to 20,000K, 16 bits/65,536 levels, providing true colors with high color saturation, satisfying the desire for color control and a sunlike environment.

● Multiple control options include the built-in timer which can adjust light color and brightness via the APP for customizable usage and precisely regulating bio-clock. **
